FILE: .eleventy.js
SIZE: 3051 bytes
MODIFIED: 2025-12-20 21:56:00
================================================================================
/**
 * Eleventy Configuration
 * Properties 4 Creations - Veteran Housing Platform
 */

module.exports = function (eleventyConfig) {
  // -----------------------------------------------------------------
  // PASSTHROUGH COPIES
  // -----------------------------------------------------------------
  
  // Static Assets
  eleventyConfig.addPassthroughCopy({ "src/css": "css" });
  eleventyConfig.addPassthroughCopy({ "src/js": "js" });
  eleventyConfig.addPassthroughCopy({ "src/videos": "videos" });
  eleventyConfig.addPassthroughCopy({ "src/images": "images" });

  // Root Files
  eleventyConfig.addPassthroughCopy({ "src/manifest.json": "manifest.json" });
  eleventyConfig.addPassthroughCopy({ "src/sw.js": "sw.js" });
  eleventyConfig.addPassthroughCopy({ "src/search-index.json": "search-index.json" });

  // GitHub Pages requirements
  eleventyConfig.addPassthroughCopy("CNAME");
  eleventyConfig.addPassthroughCopy(".nojekyll");

  // -----------------------------------------------------------------
  // REMOVED LINES (DO NOT UNCOMMENT)
  // -----------------------------------------------------------------
  // eleventyConfig.addPassthroughCopy({ "src/_data": "_data" });      <-- UNSAFE
  // eleventyConfig.addPassthroughCopy({ "src/_includes": "_includes" }); <-- UNSAFE
  
  // NOTE: If your JavaScript needs specific JSON data (like properties.json), 
  // copy ONLY that specific file, not the entire _data folder:
  // eleventyConfig.addPassthroughCopy({ "src/_data/properties.json": "data/properties.json" });

  // -----------------------------------------------------------------
  // FILTERS
  // -----------------------------------------------------------------

  // Date Filter
  eleventyConfig.addFilter("dateFormat", (date) => {
    return new Date(date).toLocaleDateString('en-US', {
      year: 'numeric',
      month: 'long',
      day: 'numeric'
    });
  });

  // Truncate Filter
  eleventyConfig.addFilter("truncate", (str, length = 120) => {
    if (!str) return '';
    if (str.length <= length) return str;
    return str.substring(0, length) + '...';
  });

  // -----------------------------------------------------------------
  // DEVELOPMENT CONFIG
  // -----------------------------------------------------------------
  
  eleventyConfig.addWatchTarget("src/css/");
  eleventyConfig.addWatchTarget("src/js/");

  eleventyConfig.setBrowserSyncConfig({
    files: ['docs/**/*'],
    open: true,
    notify: false
  });

  // -----------------------------------------------------------------
  // RETURN OBJECT
  // -----------------------------------------------------------------
  return {
    dir: {
      input: "src",
      output: "docs",
      includes: "_includes", // Eleventy looks here automatically for templates
      data: "_data"          // Eleventy looks here automatically for data
    },
    templateFormats: ["html", "njk", "md"],
    htmlTemplateEngine: "njk",
    markdownTemplateEngine: "njk"
  };
};

FILE: .eslintrc.json

{
  "env": {
    "browser": true,
    "es2021": true,
    "node": true
  },
  "extends": [
    "eslint:recommended"
  ],
  "parserOptions": {
    "ecmaVersion": "latest",
    "sourceType": "module"
  },
  "rules": {
    "no-console": "warn",
    "no-unused-vars": "error",
    "no-undef": "error",
    "no-debugger": "error",
    "no-var": "error",
    "prefer-const": "error",
    "prefer-arrow-callback": "error",
    "arrow-spacing": "error",
    "comma-dangle": ["error", "never"],
    "quotes": ["error", "single", { "allowTemplateLiterals": true }],
    "semi": ["error", "always"],
    "indent": ["error", 2],
    "space-before-function-paren": ["error", "always"],
    "keyword-spacing": "error",
    "space-before-blocks": "error",
    "object-curly-spacing": ["error", "always"],
    "array-bracket-spacing": ["error", "never"],
    "brace-style": ["error", "1tbs", { "allowSingleLine": true }]
  },
  "ignorePatterns": [
    "docs/",
    "public/",
    "node_modules/"
  ]
}


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
FILE: .github\workflows\build-deploy.yml
SIZE: 1748 bytes
MODIFIED: 2025-12-16 03:08:30
================================================================================
name: Build and Deploy

on:
  push:
    branches: [ main, master ]
  pull_request:
    branches: [ main, master ]

permissions:
  contents: write
  pages: write
  id-token: write

jobs:
  lint:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    
    steps:
    - name: Checkout code
      uses: actions/checkout@v4
      
    - name: Setup Node.js
      uses: actions/setup-node@v4
      with:
        node-version: '18'
        cache: 'npm'
        
    - name: Install dependencies
      run: npm ci
      
    - name: Run ESLint
      run: npm run lint

  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    needs: lint
    
    steps:
    - name: Checkout code
      uses: actions/checkout@v4
      
    - name: Setup Node.js
      uses: actions/setup-node@v4
      with:
        node-version: '18'
        cache: 'npm'
        
    - name: Install dependencies
      run: npm ci
      
    - name: Build site
      run: npm run build
      
    - name: Upload build artifacts
      uses: actions/upload-artifact@v4
      with:
        name: dist
        path: docs/

  deploy:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    needs: build
    if: github.ref == 'refs/heads/main' && github.event_name == 'push'
    
    steps:
    - name: Checkout code
      uses: actions/checkout@v4
      
    - name: Setup Node.js
      uses: actions/setup-node@v4
      with:
        node-version: '18'
        cache: 'npm'
        
    - name: Install dependencies
      run: npm ci
      
    - name: Build for production
      run: npm run build
      
    - name: Deploy to GitHub Pages
      uses: peaceiris/actions-gh-pages@v3
      with:
        github_token: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}
        publish_dir: ./docs


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
FILE: .github\workflows\comprehensive-testing.yml
SIZE: 13261 bytes
MODIFIED: 2025-12-15 14:33:35
================================================================================
name: Comprehensive Testing & Quality Assurance

on:
  push:
    branches: [ main, develop ]
  pull_request:
    branches: [ main, develop ]

env:
  NODE_VERSION: '18'
  CI: true

jobs:
  code-quality:
    name: Code Quality & Linting
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    
    steps:
      - name: Checkout code
        uses: actions/checkout@v4
        
      - name: Setup Node.js
        uses: actions/setup-node@v4
        with:
          node-version: ${{ env.NODE_VERSION }}
          cache: 'npm'
          
      - name: Install dependencies
        run: npm ci
        
      - name: Run ESLint
        run: npm run lint
        
      - name: Check Prettier formatting
        run: npm run format:check
        
      - name: Security audit
        run: npm audit --audit-level moderate

  unit-tests:
    name: Unit Tests & Coverage
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    needs: code-quality
    
    steps:
      - name: Checkout code
        uses: actions/checkout@v4
        
      - name: Setup Node.js
        uses: actions/setup-node@v4
        with:
          node-version: ${{ env.NODE_VERSION }}
          cache: 'npm'
          
      - name: Install dependencies
        run: npm ci
        
      - name: Run unit tests with coverage
        run: npm run test:coverage
        
      - name: Upload coverage reports
        uses: codecov/codecov-action@v3
        with:
          file: ./coverage/lcov.info
          flags: unittests
          name: codecov-umbrella

  integration-tests:
    name: Integration Tests
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    needs: unit-tests
    
    steps:
      - name: Checkout code
        uses: actions/checkout@v4
        
      - name: Setup Node.js
        uses: actions/setup-node@v4
        with:
          node-version: ${{ env.NODE_VERSION }}
          cache: 'npm'
          
      - name: Install dependencies
        run: npm ci
        
      - name: Build site
        run: npm run build
        
      - name: Start development server
        run: |
          npm run dev &
          sleep 10
          
      - name: Run integration tests
        run: npm run test -- tests/integration/
        
      - name: Upload integration test results
        uses: actions/upload-artifact@v3
        if: failure()
        with:
          name: integration-test-results
          path: |
            tests/integration-results/
            test-results/

  accessibility-tests:
    name: Accessibility Testing
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    needs: unit-tests
    
    steps:
      - name: Checkout code
        uses: actions/checkout@v4
        
      - name: Setup Node.js
        uses: actions/setup-node@v4
        with:
          node-version: ${{ env.NODE_VERSION }}
          cache: 'npm'
          
      - name: Install dependencies
        run: npm ci
        
      - name: Build site
        run: npm run build
        
      - name: Start development server
        run: |
          npm run dev &
          sleep 10
          
      - name: Run accessibility tests with axe-core
        run: |
          npx playwright test tests/e2e/ --grep="Accessibility|accessibility" --reporter=html
          
      - name: Upload accessibility test results
        uses: actions/upload-artifact@v3
        if: always()
        with:
          name: accessibility-test-results
          path: |
            test-results/
            playwright-report/

  e2e-tests:
    name: End-to-End Tests
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    needs: unit-tests
    
    strategy:
      matrix:
        browser: [chromium, firefox, webkit]
        
    steps:
      - name: Checkout code
        uses: actions/checkout@v4
        
      - name: Setup Node.js
        uses: actions/setup-node@v4
        with:
          node-version: ${{ env.NODE_VERSION }}
          cache: 'npm'
          
      - name: Install dependencies
        run: npm ci
        
      - name: Build site
        run: npm run build
        
      - name: Install Playwright browsers
        run: npx playwright install ${{ matrix.browser }} --with-deps
        
      - name: Start development server
        run: |
          npm run dev &
          sleep 10
          
      - name: Run Playwright tests
        run: npx playwright test --project=${{ matrix.browser }}
        
      - name: Upload Playwright Report
        uses: actions/upload-artifact@v3
        if: always()
        with:
          name: playwright-report-${{ matrix.browser }}
          path: |
            playwright-report/
            test-results/

  lighthouse:
    name: Lighthouse Performance Audit
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    needs: unit-tests
    
    steps:
      - name: Checkout code
        uses: actions/checkout@v4
        
      - name: Setup Node.js
        uses: actions/setup-node@v4
        with:
          node-version: ${{ env.NODE_VERSION }}
          cache: 'npm'
          
      - name: Install dependencies
        run: npm ci
        
      - name: Build site
        run: npm run build
        
      - name: Install LHCI
        run: npm install -g @lhci/cli@0.12.x
        
      - name: Start development server
        run: |
          npm run dev &
          sleep 10
          
      - name: Run Lighthouse CI
        run: lhci autorun
        env:
          LHCI_GITHUB_APP_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.LHCI_GITHUB_APP_TOKEN }}
          
      - name: Upload Lighthouse reports
        uses: actions/upload-artifact@v3
        if: always()
        with:
          name: lighthouse-reports
          path: |
            .lighthouseci/
            reports/

  cross-browser-tests:
    name: Cross-Browser Compatibility
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    needs: unit-tests
    
    steps:
      - name: Checkout code
        uses: actions/checkout@v4
        
      - name: Setup Node.js
        uses: actions/setup-node@v4
        with:
          node-version: ${{ env.NODE_VERSION }}
          cache: 'npm'
          
      - name: Install dependencies
        run: npm ci
        
      - name: Build site
        run: npm run build
        
      - name: Install Playwright browsers
        run: npx playwright install --with-deps
        
      - name: Start development server
        run: |
          npm run dev &
          sleep 10
          
      - name: Run cross-browser tests
        run: |
          npx playwright test tests/e2e/cross-browser.spec.js --reporter=html
          
      - name: Upload cross-browser test results
        uses: actions/upload-artifact@v3
        if: always()
        with:
          name: cross-browser-test-results
          path: |
            test-results/
            playwright-report/

  security-tests:
    name: Security Testing
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    needs: unit-tests
    
    steps:
      - name: Checkout code
        uses: actions/checkout@v4
        
      - name: Setup Node.js
        uses: actions/setup-node@v4
        with:
          node-version: ${{ env.NODE_VERSION }}
          cache: 'npm'
          
      - name: Install dependencies
        run: npm ci
        
      - name: Run security validation
        run: node scripts/security-test-validator.js
        
      - name: Test XSS protection
        run: |
          npm run build
          node tests/security/xss-protection.test.js
          
      - name: Test CSRF protection
        run: node tests/security/csrf-protection.test.js

  mobile-tests:
    name: Mobile Responsiveness
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    needs: unit-tests
    
    steps:
      - name: Checkout code
        uses: actions/checkout@v4
        
      - name: Setup Node.js
        uses: actions/setup-node@v4
        with:
          node-version: ${{ env.NODE_VERSION }}
          cache: 'npm'
          
      - name: Install dependencies
        run: npm ci
        
      - name: Install Playwright browsers
        run: npx playwright install --with-deps
        
      - name: Start development server
        run: |
          npm run dev &
          sleep 10
          
      - name: Run mobile tests
        run: |
          npx playwright test tests/e2e/mobile.spec.js --reporter=html
          
      - name: Upload mobile test results
        uses: actions/upload-artifact@v3
        if: always()
        with:
          name: mobile-test-results
          path: |
            test-results/
            playwright-report/

  performance-tests:
    name: Performance Testing
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    needs: unit-tests
    
    steps:
      - name: Checkout code
        uses: actions/checkout@v4
        
      - name: Setup Node.js
        uses: actions/setup-node@v4
        with:
          node-version: ${{ env.NODE_VERSION }}
          cache: 'npm'
          
      - name: Install dependencies
        run: npm ci
        
      - name: Build site
        run: npm run build
        
      - name: Start development server
        run: |
          npm run dev &
          sleep 10
          
      - name: Run performance benchmarks
        run: |
          npx playwright test tests/e2e/performance.spec.js --reporter=json > test-results/performance.json
          
      - name: Upload performance results
        uses: actions/upload-artifact@v3
        if: always()
        with:
          name: performance-test-results
          path: test-results/

  build-and-deploy:
    name: Build & Deploy
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    needs: [unit-tests, integration-tests, e2e-tests, lighthouse, security-tests]
    if: github.ref == 'refs/heads/main'
    
    steps:
      - name: Checkout code
        uses: actions/checkout@v4
        
      - name: Setup Node.js
        uses: actions/setup-node@v4
        with:
          node-version: ${{ env.NODE_VERSION }}
          cache: 'npm'
          
      - name: Install dependencies
        run: npm ci
        
      - name: Run final build
        run: npm run build
        
      - name: Optimize images
        run: node scripts/optimize-images.js
        
      - name: Generate SRI hashes
        run: node scripts/generate-sri-hashes.js
        
      - name: Deploy to GitHub Pages
        uses: peaceiris/actions-gh-pages@v3
        with:
          github_token: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}
          publish_dir: ./dist
          cname: ${{ secrets.CNAME }}

  quality-gate:
    name: Quality Gate
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    needs: [unit-tests, integration-tests, e2e-tests, lighthouse, security-tests]
    if: always()
    
    steps:
      - name: Check test results
        run: |
          if [[ "${{ needs.unit-tests.result }}" == "failure" ]]; then
            echo "Unit tests failed"
            exit 1
          fi
          
          if [[ "${{ needs.integration-tests.result }}" == "failure" ]]; then
            echo "Integration tests failed"
            exit 1
          fi
          
          if [[ "${{ needs.e2e-tests.result }}" == "failure" ]]; then
            echo "E2E tests failed"
            exit 1
          fi
          
          if [[ "${{ needs.lighthouse.result }}" == "failure" ]]; then
            echo "Lighthouse tests failed"
            exit 1
          fi
          
          if [[ "${{ needs.security-tests.result }}" == "failure" ]]; then
            echo "Security tests failed"
            exit 1
          fi
          
          echo "All tests passed successfully!"
          
      - name: Post success comment
        if: github.event_name == 'pull_request'
        uses: actions/github-script@v6
        with:
          script: |
            github.rest.issues.createComment({
              issue_number: context.issue.number,
              owner: context.repo.owner,
              repo: context.repo.repo,
              body: '🎉 All tests passed successfully! The code is ready for review and deployment.'
            })

  performance-regression:
    name: Performance Regression Detection
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    needs: [build-and-deploy]
    if: github.ref == 'refs/heads/main'
    
    steps:
      - name: Checkout code
        uses: actions/checkout@v4
        
      - name: Setup Node.js
        uses: actions/setup-node@v4
        with:
          node-version: ${{ env.NODE_VERSION }}
          cache: 'npm'
          
      - name: Install dependencies
        run: npm ci
        
      - name: Install LHCI
        run: npm install -g @lhci/cli@0.12.x
        
      - name: Run performance regression test
        run: |
          lhci autorun --upload.target=temporary-public-storage
          
      - name: Comment performance results
        if: github.event_name == 'pull_request'
        uses: actions/github-script@v6
        with:
          script: |
            // This would typically fetch and comment on performance metrics
            console.log('Performance regression check completed');

FILE: .github\workflows\deploy.yml
SIZE: 1089 bytes
MODIFIED: 2025-12-18 22:07:46
================================================================================
name: Deploy to GitHub Pages

on:
  push:
    branches: [ 'main' ]
  pull_request:
    branches: [ 'main' ]

permissions:
  contents: read
  pages: write
  id-token: write

concurrency:
  group: 'pages'
  cancel-in-progress: false

jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    
    steps:
    - name: Checkout
      uses: actions/checkout@v4
      
    - name: Setup Node.js
      uses: actions/setup-node@v4
      with:
        node-version: '18'
        cache: 'npm'
        
    - name: Install dependencies
      run: npm ci
      
    - name: Build site
      run: npm run build
      
    - name: Setup Pages
      uses: actions/configure-pages@v4
      
    - name: Upload artifact
      uses: actions/upload-pages-artifact@v3
      with:
        path: './docs'

  deploy:
    needs: build
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    
    environment:
      name: github-pages
      url: ${{ steps.deployment.outputs.page_url }}
    
    steps:
    - name: Deploy to GitHub Pages
      id: deployment
      uses: actions/deploy-pages@v4

        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {
            // Track 404 errors (if analytics is set up)
            if (window.gtag) {
                gtag('event', 'page_not_found', {

                                </h4>

                                <a href="contact.html" aria-label="Contact our team">
                                    Contact Us
                                    <i data-lucide="arrow-right" aria-hidden="true"></i>
                                </a>
                            </div>

                                    Learn More
                                    <i data-lucide="arrow-right" aria-hidden="true"></i>
                                </a>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>

                    <!-- Search Alternative -->

                        <h3>Looking for something specific?</h3>
                        <p>Our team can help you find the right housing solution.
                            Call us or send us a message.</p>
                        <div class="contact-actions">
                            <a href="tel:+19035551234" class="btn btn-primary"
                                aria-label="Call Properties 4 Creations at (903) 555-1234">

                                (903) 555-1234
                            </a>

                            </a>

            </div>
        </section>

                        <h2 id="mission-heading">Our Mission</h2>
                        <p>Properties 4 Creations exists to honor the service of veterans and families by providing
                            premium, renovated housing that serves as the foundation for rebuilding lives and
                            strengthening communities across East Texas.</p>

                        <p>Founded and operated by veterans, we understand the unique challenges our fellow service
                            members face when transitioning to civilian life. Stable, quality housing isn't just a
                            need—it's a stepping stone to success.</p>

                        <div class="mission-values" role="list" aria-label="Our core values">
                            <div class="value-card" role="listitem">

                            </div>
                            <div class="value-card" role="listitem">

                            </div>
                            <div class="value-card" role="listitem">
                                <h3><i data-lucide="award" aria-hidden="true"></i> Excellence</h3>

                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>

            <div class="container">
                <div class="story-content">
                    <h2 id="story-heading">Our Story</h2>
                    <div class="story-timeline" role="list" aria-label="Company timeline">
                        <div class="timeline-item" role="listitem">
                            <div class="timeline-year">2020</div>
                            <div class="timeline-content">
                                <h3>The Beginning</h3>
                                <p>After witnessing too many veterans struggling with housing stability, our founder
                                    decided to take action. Properties 4 Creations was established with a single
                                    mission: provide quality housing for those who served.</p>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                        <div class="timeline-item" role="listitem">
                            <div class="timeline-year">2021</div>
                            <div class="timeline-content">
                                <h3>First Renovations</h3>
                                <p>We purchased and renovated our first property in Tyler, Texas. Every home had to meet
                                    our rigorous standards - no shortcuts, no compromises. The
                                    just before first family moved in Christmas.</p>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                        <div class="timeline-item" role="listitem">
                            <div class="timeline-year">2022</div>
                            <div class="timeline-content">
                                <h3>Growth & Partnerships</h3>
                                <p>We partnered with the VA and local housing authorities to become HUD-VASH and Section
                                    8 certified. Our reputation for quality and veteran-focused service began to grow
                                    across East Texas.</p>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                        <div class="timeline-item" role="listitem">
                            <div class="timeline-year">2023</div>
                            <div class="timeline-content">
                                <h3>Expansion</h3>
                                <p>We expanded operations to Marshall, Mineola, and Longview. Our portfolio grew to
                                    include
                                    townhomes, historic properties, and modern studios - each renovated with the same
                                    attention to detail and veteran-first approach.</p>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                        <div class="timeline-item" role="listitem">
                            <div class="timeline-year">2024</div>
                            <div class="timeline-content">
                                <h3>Recognition</h3>
                                <p>Properties 4 Creations received recognition from the Texas Veterans Commission for
                                    our
                                    outstanding service to the veteran community. We continue to grow while maintaining
                                    our core values and commitment to excellence.</p>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </section>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">

<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Apply Now - Properties 4 Creations</title>
    <link rel="manifest" href="/manifest.json">
    <link rel="apple-touch-icon" href="/images/apple-touch-icon.png">
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="/css/style.css">
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://unpkg.com/lucide@latest/dist/umd/lucide.css"
        integrity="sha384-sha384-GGE05hfBHktPnRBuvrQUr4zlWkq0EU1L8niEW9sctrgzmzYcAWFcIo2ywmkZa0Hu"
        crossorigin="anonymous">
    <meta name="msapplication-TileColor" content="#0B1120">
    <meta name="description"
        content="Start your application for veteran housing in East Texas. Properties 4 Creations accepts Section 8 and HUD-VASH vouchers.">
</head>

<body>
    <!-- Skip Link -->
    <a href="#main" class="skip-link">Skip to main content</a>

    <!-- HEADER -->
    <nav class="navbar" role="navigation" aria-label="Main navigation">
    <div class="nav-container">
        <div class="nav-brand">
            <a href="/" class="brand-link">
                <img src="/images/logo/brand-logo-header-footer.svg" alt="Properties 4 Creations Logo" class="brand-logo">
                <span class="brand-text">Properties 4 Creations</span>
            </a>
        </div>

        <button class="menu-toggle" aria-label="Toggle navigation menu" aria-expanded="false">
            <span></span>
            <span></span>
            <span></span>
        </button>

        <ul class="nav-menu" id="nav-menu">
            <li><a href="/" class="nav-link">Home</a></li>
            <li><a href="/properties/" class="nav-link">Properties</a></li>
            <li><a href="/about/" class="nav-link">About</a></li>
            <li><a href="/resources/" class="nav-link">Resources</a></li>
            <li><a href="/contact/" class="nav-link">Contact</a></li>
            <li><a href="/apply/" class="btn btn-primary cta-link">Apply Now</a></li>
        </ul>
    </div>
</nav>


    <main id="main">
        <!-- APPLICATION HEADER -->
        <section class="page-banner bg-home-banner">
            <div class="container">
                <h1>Start Your Application</h1>
                <p>Your next chapter starts here. We accept Section 8 and HUD-VASH vouchers.</p>
            </div>
        </section>

        <!-- APPLICATION FORM -->
        <section class="form-container">
            <div class="container">
                <div class="form-wrapper">
                    <h1>Application for Housing</h1>
                    <p>Please complete this form to begin your housing application. We'll review your information and
                        contact you within 24-48 hours.</p>

                    <div id="success-message" class="success-message">
                        ✓ Your application has been submitted successfully! We'll be in touch within 24-48 hours.
                    </div>

                    <form id="application-form" name="application-form">
                        <!-- Personal Information -->
                        <fieldset>
                            <legend>Personal Information</legend>

                            <div class="form-group">
                                <label for="full-name">Full Legal Name *</label>
                                <input type="text" id="full-name" name="fullName" required>
                                <span class="error-message">Full name is required</span>
                            </div>

                            <div class="form-group">
                                <label for="email">Email Address *</label>
                                <input type="email" id="email" name="email" required>
                                <span class="error-message">Valid email address is required</span>
                            </div>

                            <div class="form-group">
                                <label for="phone">Primary Phone Number *</label>
                                <input type="tel" id="phone" name="phone" required pattern="[0-9\-\+\(\)\s]+">
                                <span class="error-message">Valid phone number is required (numbers, spaces, dashes,
                                    parentheses only)</span>
                            </div>

                            <div class="form-group">
                                <label for="date-of-birth">Date of Birth *</label>
                                <input type="date" id="date-of-birth" name="dateOfBirth" required>
                                <span class="error-message">Date of birth is required</span>
                            </div>
                        </fieldset>

                        <!-- Application Type & Voucher Information -->
                        <fieldset>
                            <legend>Housing Assistance</legend>

                            <div class="form-group">
                                <label for="applicant-type">How are you applying? *</label>
                                <select id="applicant-type" name="applicantType" required>
                                    <option value="">-- Select an option --</option>
                                    <option value="veteran">Veteran</option>
                                    <option value="spouse">Spouse/Surviving Spouse of Veteran</option>
                                    <option value="family">Family Member</option>
                                    <option value="general">General Applicant</option>
                                    <option value="other">Other</option>
                                </select>
                                <span class="error-message">Please select how you are applying</span>
                            </div>

                            <div class="form-group">
                                <label for="voucher-type">What voucher or housing assistance do you hold? *</label>
                                <select id="voucher-type" name="voucherType" required>
                                    <option value="">-- Select an option --</option>
                                    <option value="hudvash">HUD-VASH (HUD-VA Supportive Housing)</option>
                                    <option value="section8">Section 8 Housing Choice Voucher</option>
                                    <option value="ssvf">SSVF (Supportive Services for Veteran Families)</option>
                                    <option value="rapid_rehousing">Rapid Re-housing</option>
                                    <option value="family_unification">Family Unification Program (FUP)</option>
                                    <option value="other_voucher">Other Voucher Program</option>
                                    <option value="no_voucher">No voucher yet - need guidance</option>
                                </select>
                                <span class="error-message">Please select your housing assistance type</span>
                            </div>

    <!-- SCRIPTS -->
    <script src="https://unpkg.com/lucide@latest/dist/umd/lucide.js"
        integrity="sha384-sha384-XcPm71GSOvViJoCA7WCb/9rSD/M3VBABxIZH30y7wbDtwRymtm2Dw2NTumuGrJqB"
        crossorigin="anonymous"></script>
    <script>
        lucide.createIcons();
    </script>
    <script src="/js/main.js"></script>

    <script>
        // APPLICATION FORM JAVASCRIPT
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {
            const form = document.getElementById('application-form');
            const successMessage = document.getElementById('success-message');
            const applicantType = document.getElementById('applicant-type');
            const militaryGroup = document.getElementById('military-service-group');

            // Hide success message by default
            successMessage.style.display = 'none';

            // Show/hide military service field based on applicant type
            applicantType.addEventListener('change', function () {
                if (this.value === 'veteran' || this.value === 'spouse') {
                    militaryGroup.style.display = 'block';
                    document.getElementById('military-service').required = true;
                } else {
                    militaryGroup.style.display = 'none';
                    document.getElementById('military-service').required = false;
                }
            });

            form.addEventListener('submit', function (e) {
                e.preventDefault();

                let isValid = true;
                const formGroups = form.querySelectorAll('.form-group');

                formGroups.forEach(group => {
                    const input = group.querySelector('input, select, textarea');
                    const errorMessage = group.querySelector('.error-message');

                    if (input && input.hasAttribute('required') && !input.value.trim()) {
                        isValid = false;
                        errorMessage.style.display = 'block';
                        input.classList.add('error');
                    } else {
                        errorMessage.style.display = 'none';
                        input.classList.remove('error');
                    }

                    // Email validation
                    if (input && input.type === 'email' && input.value) {
                        const emailRegex = /^[^\s@]+@[^\s@]+\.[^\s@]+$/;
                        if (!emailRegex.test(input.value)) {
                            isValid = false;
                            errorMessage.textContent = 'Please enter a valid email address';
                            errorMessage.style.display = 'block';
                            input.classList.add('error');
                        }
                    }

                    // Phone validation
                    if (input && input.type === 'tel' && input.value) {
                        const phoneRegex = /^[0-9\-\+\(\)\s]+$/;
                        if (!phoneRegex.test(input.value)) {
                            isValid = false;
                            errorMessage.textContent = 'Please enter a valid phone number';
                            errorMessage.style.display = 'block';
                            input.classList.add('error');
                        }
                    }
                });

                if (isValid) {
                    // Here you would typically send the form data to a server
                    // For now, we'll just show the success message
                    successMessage.style.display = 'block';
                    form.reset();

                    // Scroll to success message
                    successMessage.scrollIntoView({ behavior: 'smooth' });
                }
            });
        });
    </script>
</body>

</html>

<!-- State Buttons -->
<button class="btn btn-success">Success</button>
<button class="btn btn-danger">Delete</button>
<button class="btn btn-warning">Warning</button>

<!-- Size Variants -->
<button class="btn btn-primary btn-xs">Extra Small</button>
<button class="btn btn-primary btn-sm">Small</button>
<button class="btn btn-primary">Default</button>
<button class="btn btn-primary btn-lg">Large</button>
<button class="btn btn-primary btn-xl">Extra Large</button>

<!-- Icon Buttons -->
<button class="btn btn-primary">
  <i data-lucide="home" class="icon icon-left"></i>
  Home
</button>

<button class="btn btn-primary">
  Next
  <i data-lucide="arrow-right" class="icon icon-right"></i>
</button>

<button class="btn btn-primary btn-icon" aria-label="Search">
  <i data-lucide="search"></i>
</button>

<!-- Loading State (JavaScript controlled) -->
<button class="btn btn-primary" id="submit-btn">Submit</button>
<script>
  // Set loading state
  ButtonUtils.setLoading("#submit-btn", "Processing...");

  // Remove loading state after operation
  setTimeout(() => {
    ButtonUtils.removeLoading("#submit-btn", "Success!");
  }, 2000);
</script>

<!-- Disabled State -->
<button class="btn btn-primary" disabled>Disabled Button</button>

<!-- Button Group -->
<div class="btn-group" role="group" aria-label="View options">
  <button class="btn btn-outline active" aria-pressed="true">List</button>
  <button class="btn btn-outline" aria-pressed="false">Grid</button>
  <button class="btn btn-outline" aria-pressed="false">Map</button>
</div>

<!-- Full Width Button -->
<button class="btn btn-primary btn-block">Full Width Button</button>

<!-- Copy to Clipboard Button -->
<button class="btn btn-secondary" data-copy="Text to copy">
  <i data-lucide="copy" class="icon icon-left"></i>
  Copy Code
</button>

<!-- Confirmation Button (Destructive) -->
<button class="btn btn-danger" id="delete-btn">Delete Property</button>
<script>
  ButtonUtils.addConfirmation("#delete-btn", "Are you sure?", function () {
    // Delete operation here
    console.log("Property deleted");
  });
</script>

<!-- Form Submit Button -->
<form action="/apply" method="POST">
  <input type="email" name="email" required />
  <button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary btn-lg">
    Submit Application
  </button>
</form>

<!-- Link styled as Button -->
<a href="/properties" class="btn btn-primary">Browse Properties</a>

<!-- Context-aware Buttons -->
<div style="background: #0b1120; padding: 2rem">
  <button class="btn btn-secondary on-dark">On Dark Background</button>
  <button class="btn btn-ghost on-dark">Ghost on Dark</button>

FILE: docs\_site\design-system\DESIGN_PRINCIPLES\index.html
SIZE: 12311 bytes
MODIFIED: 2025-12-18 22:07:28
================================================================================
<h1>Design Principles - Properties 4 Creations</h1>
<h2>Overview</h2>
<p>This document outlines the design principles, visual language, and guidelines for the Properties 4 Creations housing platform serving <strong>families and veterans</strong> in East Texas. These principles ensure consistency, accessibility, and a professional user experience across all touchpoints.</p>
<hr>
<h2>Core Values</h2>
<h3>1. Family &amp; Veteran-First Design</h3>
<ul>
<li>Design with dignity, respect, and accessibility as primary concerns for all families and veterans</li>
<li>Use clear, straightforward language without jargon</li>
<li>Provide multiple pathways to complete tasks</li>
<li>Ensure all critical information is easily discoverable</li>
<li>Consider diverse family structures and needs</li>
<li>Honor veteran service while welcoming all eligible families</li>
</ul>
<h3>2. Transparency &amp; Trust</h3>
<ul>
<li>Clear information hierarchy with honest communication</li>
<li>No hidden fees, terms, or conditions</li>
<li>Progress indicators for multi-step processes</li>
<li>Consistent, predictable interface patterns</li>
</ul>
<h3>3. Accessibility (WCAG 2.2 AA)</h3>
<ul>
<li>Minimum 4.5:1 contrast ratio for all text</li>
<li>44x44px minimum touch targets</li>
<li>Full keyboard navigation support</li>
<li>Screen reader compatibility</li>
<li>Respect user preferences (reduced motion, color scheme)</li>
</ul>
<h3>4. Performance</h3>
<ul>
<li>Core Web Vitals compliance (LCP &lt;2.5s, FID &lt;100ms, CLS &lt;0.1)</li>
<li>Progressive enhancement approach</li>
<li>Offline-first PWA capabilities</li>
<li>Optimized images and assets</li>
</ul>
<hr>
<h2>Visual Language</h2>
<h3>Color Palette</h3>
<h4>Primary Colors</h4>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>Color</th>
<th>Hex</th>
<th>Usage</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>Navy</td>
<td><code>#0B1120</code></td>
<td>Brand, headers, CTAs, primary text</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>Gold</td>
<td><code>#C28E5A</code></td>
<td>Accents, highlights, interactive elements</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>Beige</td>
<td><code>#F5F5F0</code></td>
<td>Backgrounds, cards</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<h4>Semantic Colors</h4>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>Color</th>
<th>Hex</th>
<th>Usage</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>Error</td>
<td><code>#D32F2F</code></td>
<td>Error states, destructive actions</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>Success</td>
<td><code>#388E3C</code></td>
<td>Success states, confirmations</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>Warning</td>
<td><code>#F57C00</code></td>
<td>Warnings, cautions</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>Info</td>
<td><code>#1976D2</code></td>
<td>Informational messages</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<h4>Neutral Colors</h4>
<ul>
<li>White (<code>#FFFFFF</code>) - Card backgrounds, text on dark</li>
<li>Gray scale (<code>#F9FAFB</code> to <code>#111827</code>) - Borders, secondary text, dividers</li>
<li>Black (<code>#000000</code>) - High contrast text when needed</li>
</ul>
<h3>Typography</h3>
<h4>Font Families</h4>
<ul>
<li><strong>Headings</strong>: Merriweather (serif) - Conveys trust and professionalism</li>
<li><strong>Body</strong>: System fonts (-apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto) - Optimal readability</li>
<li><strong>Code</strong>: Monaco, Courier New (monospace) - Technical content</li>
</ul>
<h4>Type Scale</h4>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>Name</th>
<th>Size</th>
<th>Line Height</th>
<th>Usage</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>xs</td>
<td>0.75rem (12px)</td>
<td>1rem</td>
<td>Captions, labels</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>sm</td>
<td>0.875rem (14px)</td>
<td>1.25rem</td>
<td>Secondary text</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>base</td>
<td>1rem (16px)</td>
<td>1.5rem</td>
<td>Body text</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>lg</td>
<td>1.125rem (18px)</td>
<td>1.75rem</td>
<td>Lead paragraphs</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>xl</td>

<td>H4 headings</td>
</tr>

<td>2.25rem (36px)</td>
<td>2.5rem</td>
<td>H1 headings</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>5xl</td>
<td>3rem (48px)</td>
<td>1</td>
<td>Hero titles</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<h3>Spacing System</h3>
<p>Based on an 8px grid system for consistent rhythm:</p>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>Token</th>
<th>Value</th>
<th>Usage</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>

<td>Tight spacing, icons</td>
</tr>

<td>Inline elements</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>spacing-3</td>

<td>Small gaps</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>spacing-4</td>

<td>Standard spacing</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>spacing-6</td>

</tr>
<tr>
<td>spacing-8</td>

<td>Large gaps</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>spacing-12</td>
<td>3rem (48px)</td>
<td>Section margins</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>spacing-16</td>

<td>Page sections</td>
</tr>
</tbody>

<table>

<tr>
<td>full</td>
<td>9999px</td>
<td>Pills, avatars</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<hr>
<h2>Component Guidelines</h2>
<h3>Buttons</h3>
<h4>Variants</h4>
<ol>
<li><strong>Primary</strong> - Main CTAs (gold background, navy text)</li>
<li><strong>Secondary</strong> - Secondary actions (navy outline)</li>
<li><strong>Tertiary</strong> - Low-emphasis actions (text only)</li>
<li><strong>Danger</strong> - Destructive actions (red)</li>
</ol>
<h4>States</h4>
<ul>
<li>Default, Hover, Active, Focus, Disabled, Loading</li>
</ul>
<h4>Sizing</h4>
<ul>
<li>Small: 36px height, 14px text</li>
<li>Medium: 44px height, 16px text (default)</li>
<li>Large: 52px height, 18px text</li>
</ul>
<h4>Rules</h4>
<ul>
<li>Always include visible focus indicator</li>
<li>Minimum 44x44px touch target</li>
<li>Use loading state for async actions</li>
<li>Include icon + text for important actions</li>
</ul>
<h3>Cards</h3>
<h4>Property Cards</h4>
<ul>
<li>Image with lazy loading</li>
<li>Title (H3)</li>
<li>Address</li>
<li>Features (beds, baths, sqft)</li>
<li>Tags (Section 8, HUD-VASH, Pet Friendly)</li>
<li>CTA button</li>
</ul>
<h4>Hover Effects</h4>
<ul>
<li>Subtle lift (translateY -4px)</li>
<li>Shadow increase</li>
<li>Image zoom (scale 1.05)</li>
</ul>
<h3>Forms</h3>
<h4>Input Fields</h4>
<ul>
<li>Clear labels above inputs</li>
<li>Placeholder text for examples only</li>
<li>Error messages below with icon</li>
<li>Success state on valid input</li>
<li>16px minimum font size (prevents iOS zoom)</li>
</ul>
<h4>Validation</h4>
<ul>
<li>Real-time validation on blur</li>
<li>Clear error messages with recovery path</li>
<li>Use aria-live for screen reader announcements</li>
</ul>
<h3>Navigation</h3>
<h4>Header</h4>
<ul>
<li>Sticky on scroll</li>
<li>Glass morphism effect</li>
<li>Mobile hamburger menu at 768px</li>
<li>Skip navigation link</li>
</ul>
<h4>Mobile Menu</h4>
<ul>
<li>Full-screen overlay</li>
<li>Focus trap when open</li>
<li>Close on Escape key</li>
<li>Animate from left</li>
</ul>
<hr>
<h2>Motion Guidelines</h2>
<h3>Duration</h3>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>Token</th>
<th>Value</th>
<th>Usage</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>instant</td>
<td>0ms</td>
<td>Immediate feedback</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>fast</td>
<td>150ms</td>
<td>Micro-interactions</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>base</td>
<td>250ms</td>
<td>Standard transitions</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>slow</td>
<td>350ms</td>
<td>Complex animations</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>slower</td>
<td>500ms</td>
<td>Page transitions</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<h3>Easing</h3>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>Token</th>
<th>Value</th>
<th>Usage</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>easeOut</td>
<td>cubic-bezier(0, 0, 0.2, 1)</td>
<td>Enter animations</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>easeIn</td>
<td>cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 1, 1)</td>
<td>Exit animations</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>easeInOut</td>
<td>cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1)</td>
<td>Move animations</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>bounce</td>
<td>cubic-bezier(0.68, -0.55, 0.265, 1.55)</td>
<td>Playful feedback</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<h3>Reduced Motion</h3>
<p>Always respect <code>prefers-reduced-motion</code>:</p>
<pre><code class="language-css">@media (prefers-reduced-motion: reduce) {
  * {
    animation-duration: 0.01ms !important;
    transition-duration: 0.01ms !important;
  }
}
</code></pre>
<hr>
<h2>Responsive Design</h2>
<h3>Breakpoints</h3>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>Name</th>
<th>Value</th>
<th>Target</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>xs</td>
<td>320px</td>
<td>Small phones</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>sm</td>
<td>640px</td>
<td>Large phones</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>md</td>
<td>768px</td>
<td>Tablets</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>lg</td>
<td>1024px</td>
<td>Laptops</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>xl</td>
<td>1280px</td>
<td>Desktops</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>2xl</td>
<td>1536px</td>
<td>Large screens</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<h3>Mobile-First Approach</h3>
<p>Write base styles for mobile, then add complexity:</p>
<pre><code class="language-css">/* Mobile (default) */
.grid {
  grid-template-columns: 1fr;
}

/* Tablet */
@media (min-width: 768px) {
  .grid {
    grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);
  }
}

/* Desktop */
@media (min-width: 1024px) {
  .grid {
    grid-template-columns: repeat(3, 1fr);
  }
}
</code></pre>
<hr>
<h2>Accessibility Checklist</h2>
<h3>Color &amp; Contrast</h3>
<ul>
<li>[ ] Text contrast ratio ≥ 4.5:1 (AA)</li>
<li>[ ] Large text contrast ratio ≥ 3:1</li>
<li>[ ] Non-text contrast ratio ≥ 3:1</li>
<li>[ ] Don't rely on color alone for meaning</li>
</ul>
<h3>Keyboard Navigation</h3>
<ul>
<li>[ ] All interactive elements focusable</li>
<li>[ ] Visible focus indicators</li>
<li>[ ] Logical tab order</li>
<li>[ ] Skip navigation link</li>
<li>[ ] Escape closes modals/menus</li>
</ul>
<h3>Screen Readers</h3>
<ul>
<li>[ ] Semantic HTML structure</li>
<li>[ ] Proper heading hierarchy (H1 → H2 → H3)</li>
<li>[ ] Alt text for images</li>
<li>[ ] ARIA labels for icons/buttons</li>
<li>[ ] Live regions for dynamic content</li>
</ul>
<h3>Forms</h3>
<ul>
<li>[ ] Labels associated with inputs</li>
<li>[ ] Error messages linked with aria-describedby</li>
<li>[ ] Required fields marked with aria-required</li>
<li>[ ] Form validation announced</li>
</ul>
<h3>Touch</h3>
<ul>
<li>[ ] 44x44px minimum touch targets</li>
<li>[ ] 8px minimum spacing between targets</li>
<li>[ ] No hover-only interactions</li>
</ul>
<hr>
<h2>File Naming Conventions</h2>
<h3>Images</h3>
<pre><code>[type]-[location]-[description].[ext]
</code></pre>
<p>Examples:</p>
<ul>
<li><code>hero-home-banner.webp</code></li>
<li><code>properties-tyler-ranch-home.webp</code></li>
<li><code>icon-section-8.svg</code></li>
</ul>
<h3>CSS Classes (BEM)</h3>
<pre><code>.block__element--modifier
</code></pre>
<p>Examples:</p>
<ul>
<li><code>.property-card</code></li>
<li><code>.property-card__image</code></li>
<li><code>.property-card--featured</code></li>
</ul>
<h3>JavaScript</h3>
<pre><code>camelCase for variables/functions
PascalCase for classes
UPPER_SNAKE_CASE for constants
</code></pre>
<hr>
<h2>Version History</h2>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>Version</th>
<th>Date</th>
<th>Changes</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>1.0.0</td>
<td>2025-12-15</td>
<td>Initial design system documentation</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<hr>

<li><a href="https://inclusive-components.design/">Inclusive Components</a></li>

</ul>

    <main id="main">
        <!-- FAQ HEADER -->
        <section class="page-banner" aria-label="Frequently Asked Questions about our veteran housing services">
            <div class="container">
                <h1>Frequently Asked Questions</h1>
                <p>Answers to common questions about our veteran housing services</p>
            </div>
        </section>

        <!-- FAQ SECTION -->
        <section class="faq-section faq-enhanced">
            <div class="container">
                <div class="faq-container" id="faq-accordion">
                    <div class="accordion__item faq-item">
                        <button class="accordion__button faq-question" type="button" aria-expanded="false"
                            aria-controls="faq-1">
                            <span>How do I apply for housing with Properties 4 Creations?</span>
                            <span class="accordion__icon" aria-hidden="true">
                                <svg width="20" height="20" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor"
                                    stroke-width="2">
                                    <polyline points="6 9 12 15 18 9" />
                                </svg>
                            </span>
                        </button>
                        <div class="accordion__panel faq-answer" id="faq-1">
                            <p>You can start your application by clicking the "Apply Now" button on any page or visiting
                                our <a href="apply.html" class="gold-link">application page</a>. The process involves:
                            </p>
                            <ol>
                                <li>Completing our online application form with your personal information</li>
                                <li>Providing details about your housing voucher and income</li>
                                <li>Allowing 24-48 hours for our team to review your application</li>
                                <li>Scheduling a property viewing if you're approved</li>
                                <li>Completing the lease signing process</li>
                            </ol>
                            <p>Our veteran team is here to guide you through each step.</p>
                        </div>
                    </div>

                    <div class="accordion__item faq-item">
                        <button class="accordion__button faq-question" type="button" aria-expanded="false"
                            aria-controls="faq-2">
                            <span>Do you accept Section 8 Housing Choice Vouchers?</span>
                            <span class="accordion__icon" aria-hidden="true">
                                <svg width="20" height="20" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor"
                                    stroke-width="2">
                                    <polyline points="6 9 12 15 18 9" />
                                </svg>
                            </span>
                        </button>
                        <div class="accordion__panel faq-answer" id="faq-2">
                            <p><strong>Yes, we accept 100% of Section 8 Housing Choice Vouchers.</strong> We are
                                committed to helping voucher holders find quality housing without discrimination. Here's
                                what you need to know:</p>
                            <ul>
                                <li>We accept vouchers from any housing authority</li>
                                <li>No application fees or discriminatory screening</li>
                                <li>Properties are pre-inspected and Section 8 ready</li>
                                <li>Our team handles all voucher coordination with your housing authority</li>
                                <li>Transparent process with clear communication at every step</li>
                            </ul>
                            <p>If you have questions about voucher acceptance, <a href="contact.html"
                                    class="gold-link">contact us directly</a>.</p>
                        </div>
                    </div>

                    <div class="accordion__item faq-item">
                        <button class="accordion__button faq-question" type="button" aria-expanded="false"
                            aria-controls="faq-3">
                            <span>What about HUD-VASH for veterans?</span>
                            <span class="accordion__icon" aria-hidden="true">
                                <svg width="20" height="20" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor"
                                    stroke-width="2">
                                    <polyline points="6 9 12 15 18 9" />
                                </svg>
                            </span>
                        </button>
                        <div class="accordion__panel faq-answer" id="faq-3">
                            <p><strong>We are fully HUD-VASH approved</strong> and actively partner with the VA to house
                                veterans. As a veteran-owned company, we understand the unique needs of our fellow
                                service members.</p>
                            <p>HUD-VASH benefits include:</p>
                            <ul>
                                <li>Direct coordination with your VA case manager</li>
                                <li>Veterans receive priority consideration</li>
                                <li>Specialized veteran-friendly properties</li>
                                <li>Ongoing support during the transition to housing</li>
                                <li>Understanding of military culture and experiences</li>
                            </ul>
                            <p>If you're working with the VA on housing, we can help streamline the process.</p>
                        </div>
                    </div>

                    <div class="accordion__item faq-item">
                        <button class="accordion__button faq-question" type="button" aria-expanded="false"
                            aria-controls="faq-4">
                            <span>What areas do you serve in East Texas?</span>
                            <span class="accordion__icon" aria-hidden="true">
                                <svg width="20" height="20" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor"
                                    stroke-width="2">
                                    <polyline points="6 9 12 15 18 9" />
                                </svg>
                            </span>
                        </button>
                        <div class="accordion__panel faq-answer" id="faq-4">
                            <p>We serve communities across East Texas, focusing on areas with strong veteran populations
                                and good access to services:</p>
                            <ul>
                                <li><strong>Primary Markets:</strong> Tyler, Longview</li>
                                <li><strong>Secondary Markets:</strong> Marshall, Jefferson, Mineola, Kemp</li>
                                <li><strong>Surrounding Areas:</strong> Nacogdoches, Palestine, Kilgore, White Oak</li>
                            </ul>
                            <p>Our properties are strategically located near:</p>
                            <ul>
                                <li>VA medical centers and outpatient clinics</li>
                                <li>Public transportation routes</li>
                                <li>Employment opportunities and job training centers</li>
                                <li>Schools and community services</li>
                                <li>Grocery stores and essential services</li>
                            </ul>
                        </div>
                    </div>

                    <div class="accordion__item faq-item">
                        <button class="accordion__button faq-question" type="button" aria-expanded="false"
                            aria-controls="faq-5">
                            <span>What makes Properties 4 Creations different from other landlords?</span>
                            <span class="accordion__icon" aria-hidden="true">
                                <svg width="20" height="20" viewBox="00 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor"
                                    stroke-width="2">
                                    <polyline points="6 9 12 15 18 9" />
                                </svg>
                            </span>
                        </button>
                        <div class="accordion__panel faq-answer" id="faq-5">
                            <p><strong>We're veteran-owned and operated</strong>, which means we bring a unique
                                understanding to housing for veterans and families. Here's what sets us apart:</p>
                            <ul>
                                <li><strong>100% Voucher Acceptance:</strong> We welcome Section 8 and HUD-VASH without
                                    discrimination</li>
                                <li><strong>Premium Renovations:</strong> Every property meets our rigorous $30,000+
                                    renovation standards</li>
                                <li><strong>Transparency:</strong> We publish our renovation standards and cost
                                    breakdowns</li>
                                <li><strong>Quality Guarantees:</strong> Comprehensive warranties on all systems</li>
                                <li><strong>Veteran Understanding:</strong> We understand military culture and
                                    challenges</li>
                                <li><strong>Community Focus:</strong> We're invested in rebuilding East Texas
                                    communities</li>
                                <li><strong>Fair Housing Compliance:</strong> Strict adherence to all
                                    anti-discrimination laws</li>
                            </ul>
                        </div>
                    </div>

                    <div class="accordion__item faq-item">
                        <button class="accordion__button faq-question" type="button" aria-expanded="false"
                            aria-controls="faq-6">
                            <span>Are all your properties recently renovated?</span>
                            <span class="accordion__icon" aria-hidden="true">
                                <svg width="20" height="20" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor"
                                    stroke-width="2">
                                    <polyline points="6 9 12 15 18 9" />
                                </svg>
                            </span>
                        </button>
                        <div class="accordion__panel faq-answer" id="faq-6">
                            <p><strong>Yes, every property undergoes comprehensive renovation</strong> before becoming
                                available. Our renovation process includes:</p>
                            <h4>Core Systems (12-month warranties)</h4>
                            <ul>
                                <li>Complete HVAC system replacement and certification</li>
                                <li>Full roof replacement with premium materials</li>
                                <li>New plumbing throughout with copper pipes</li>
                                <li>Modern electrical systems with code compliance</li>
                            </ul>
                            <h4>Interior Finishes (6-month warranties)</h4>
                            <ul>
                                <li>Professional painting throughout</li>
                                <li>New or refinished flooring</li>
                                <li>Updated kitchens with new appliances</li>
                                <li>Modern bathrooms with new fixtures</li>
                                <li>Fresh fixtures and lighting</li>
                            </ul>
                            <p>See our complete <a href="transparency.html" class="gold-link">renovation standards</a>
                                for full details.</p>
                        </div>
                    </div>

                    <div class="accordion__item faq-item">
                        <button class="accordion__button faq-question" type="button" aria-expanded="false"
                            aria-controls="faq-7">
                            <span>How long does the application process take?</span>
                            <span class="accordion__icon" aria-hidden="true">
                                <svg width="20" height="20" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor"
                                    stroke-width="2">
                                    <polyline points="6 9 12 15 18 9" />
                                </svg>
                            </span>
                        </button>
                        <div class="accordion__panel faq-answer" id="faq-7">
                            <p>The timeline varies based on your voucher status and property availability:</p>
                            <h4>For Applicants with Active Vouchers</h4>
                            <ul>
                                <li><strong>Application Review:</strong> 24-48 hours</li>
                                <li><strong>Document Verification:</strong> 1-3 business days</li>
                                <li><strong>Property Viewing:</strong> Same week if approved</li>
                                <li><strong>Lease Signing:</strong> Within 1-2 weeks</li>
                            </ul>
                            <h4>For Applicants Without Vouchers</h4>
                            <ul>
                                <li><strong>Application Review:</strong> 24-48 hours</li>
                                <li><strong>Voucher Guidance:</strong> We'll help connect you with local housing
                                    authorities</li>
                                <li><strong>Timeline:</strong> Depends on housing authority waitlist status</li>
                            </ul>
                            <p>We'll keep you informed throughout the entire process.</p>
                        </div>
                    </div>

                    <div class="accordion__item faq-item">
                        <button class="accordion__button faq-question" type="button" aria-expanded="false"
                            aria-controls="faq-8">
                            <span>What if I don't have a housing voucher yet?</span>
                            <span class="accordion__icon" aria-hidden="true">
                                <svg width="20" height="20" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor"
                                    stroke-width="2">
                                    <polyline points="6 9 12 15 18 9" />
                                </svg>
                            </span>
                        </button>
                        <div class="accordion__panel faq-answer" id="faq-8">
                            <p><strong>We can help guide you through the voucher process.</strong> Here's how we assist
                                applicants without vouchers:</p>
                            <h4>Section 8 Vouchers</h4>
                            <ul>
                                <li>Help you understand eligibility requirements</li>
                                <li>Connect you with local housing authorities</li>
                                <li>Guide you through application processes</li>
                                <li>Monitor waitlist openings</li>
                            </ul>
                            <h4>HUD-VASH for Veterans</h4>
                            <ul>
                                <li>Coordinate with your VA case manager</li>
                                <li>Provide documentation of our veteran-friendly properties</li>
                                <li>Support the voucher application process</li>
                                <li>Expedite property matching once voucher is issued</li>
                            </ul>
                            <p>Contact us to discuss your situation and we'll create a personalized plan.</p>
                        </div>
                    </div>

                    <div class="accordion__item faq-item">
                        <button class="accordion__button faq-question" type="button" aria-expanded="false"
                            aria-controls="faq-9">
                            <span>What are your income requirements?</span>
                            <span class="accordion__icon" aria-hidden="true">
                                <svg width="20" height="20" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor"
                                    stroke-width="2">
                                    <polyline points="6 9 12 15 18 9" />
                                </svg>
                            </span>
                        </button>
                        <div class="accordion__panel faq-answer" id="faq-9">
                            <p>Income requirements vary by program and are set by the housing authorities, but
                                generally:</p>
                            <h4>Section 8 Housing Choice Vouchers</h4>
                            <ul>
                                <li>Typically 50% or below Area Median Income (AMI)</li>
                                <li>For East Texas (2025): Single person maximum ≈ $19,750/year</li>
                                <li>Four-person household maximum ≈ $28,200/year</li>
                            </ul>
                            <h4>HUD-VASH</h4>
                            <ul>
                                <li>Usually 50% or below AMI</li>
                                <li>Special considerations for homeless veterans</li>
                                <li>Case-by-case evaluation for extreme circumstances</li>
                            </ul>
                            <p>We can help you determine if you meet current income requirements for your area.</p>
                        </div>
                    </div>

                    <div class="accordion__item faq-item">
                        <button class="accordion__button faq-question" type="button" aria-expanded="false"
                            aria-controls="faq-10">
                            <span>What are your income requirements?</span>
                            <span class="accordion__icon" aria-hidden="true">
                                <svg width="20" height="20" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor"
                                    stroke-width="2">
                                    <polyline points="6 9 12 15 18 9" />
                                </svg>
                            </span>
                        </button>
                        <div class="accordion__panel faq-answer" id="faq-10">
                            <p>Income requirements vary by program and are set by the housing authorities, but
                                generally:</p>
                            <h4>Section 8 Housing Choice Vouchers</h4>
                            <ul>
                                <li>Typically 50% or below Area Median Income (AMI)</li>
                                <li>For East Texas (2025): Single person maximum ≈ $19,750/year</li>
                                <li>Four-person household maximum ≈ $28,200/year</li>
                            </ul>
                            <h4>HUD-VASH</h4>
                            <ul>
                                <li>Usually 50% or below AMI</li>
                                <li>Special considerations for homeless veterans</li>
                                <li>Case-by-case evaluation for extreme circumstances</li>
                            </ul>
                            <p>We can help you determine if you meet current income requirements for your area.</p>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </section>
    </main>

    <!-- FOOTER -->

        // MAP INITIALIZATION
        if (document.getElementById('map')) {
            const script = document.createElement('script');
            script.src = 'https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/leaflet@1.9.4/dist/leaflet.js';
            script.integrity = 'sha256-20nQCchB9co0qIjJZRGuk2/Z9VM+kNiyxNV1lvTlZBo=';
            script.crossOrigin = 'anonymous';
            script.onload = () => {
                const map = L.map('map').setView([32.35, -95.3], 10);
                L.tileLayer('https://{s}.tile.openstreetmap.org/{z}/{x}/{y}.png', {
                    attribution: '© OpenStreetMap contributors',
                    maxZoom: 19
                }).addTo(map);

                L.marker([32.351, -95.301], {
                    title: 'Tyler Properties'
                }).addTo(map).bindPopup('<b>Tyler, TX</b><br>Multiple Properties Available');

                L.marker([32.50, -94.74], {
                    title: 'Longview Properties'
                }).addTo(map).bindPopup('<b>Longview, TX</b><br>Multiple Properties Available');
            };
            document.head.appendChild(script);
        }
    </script>
</body>

                    East Texas. This property maintains the integrity of its historic design while providing all the
                    modern amenities your family needs.</p>

                <div class="heritage-grid">
                    <div class="heritage-card">
                        <h3>🎨 Queen Anne Style</h3>
                        <p>This Queen Anne Victorian showcases elaborate trim work, steep roof pitches, and asymmetrical
                            floor plans characteristic of the style popular from 1870-1910.</p>
                    </div>
                    <div class="heritage-card">
                        <h3>🌳 Historic Preservation</h3>
                        <p>Our renovation work is guided by historic preservation principles, ensuring this piece of
                            Longview's heritage is protected for future generations.</p>
                    </div>
                    <div class="heritage-card">
                        <h3>🏘️ Energy Efficiency</h3>
                        <p>Modern insulation and energy-efficient systems mean this historic home performs as well as
                            contemporary builds while preserving architectural beauty.</p>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </section>

        <!-- NEIGHBORHOOD INFORMATION -->
        <section class="neighborhood-info">
            <div class="container">
                <h2>About the Longview Historic District</h2>

  <body>
    <div class="offline-container">
      <div class="offline-icon">
        <svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">

        </svg>
      </div>

      <h1>You're Offline</h1>
      <p>
        It looks like you've lost your internet connection. Don't worry - some
        pages may still be available from your device's cache.
      </p>

      <div class="actions">
        <button onclick="window.location.reload()" class="btn btn-primary">
          <svg
            width="20"
            height="20"
            viewBox="0 0 24 24"
            fill="none"
            stroke="currentColor"
            stroke-width="2"
          >
            <path d="M23 4v6h-6" />
            <path d="M1 20v-6h6" />
            <path
              d="M3.51 9a9 9 0 0 1 14.85-3.36L23 10M1 14l4.64 4.36A9 9 0 0 0 20.49 15"
            />
          </svg>
          Try Again
        </button>

        <a href="/" class="btn btn-secondary">
          <svg
            width="20"
            height="20"
            viewBox="0 0 24 24"
            fill="none"
            stroke="currentColor"
            stroke-width="2"
          >
            <path d="M3 9l9-7 9 7v11a2 2 0 0 1-2 2H5a2 2 0 0 1-2-2z" />
            <polyline points="9 22 9 12 15 12 15 22" />
          </svg>
          Go Home
        </a>
      </div>

      <div class="status-indicator">
        <span class="status-dot" id="status-dot"></span>
        <span id="status-text">Checking connection...</span>
      </div>

      <div class="cached-pages" id="cached-pages" style="display: none">
        <h2>Available Offline Pages</h2>
        <ul id="cached-list"></ul>
      </div>
    </div>

    <script>
      // Check online status
      function updateOnlineStatus() {
        const dot = document.getElementById("status-dot");
        const text = document.getElementById("status-text");

        if (navigator.onLine) {
          dot.classList.add("online");
          text.textContent = "Connection restored! Reloading...";
          setTimeout(() => window.location.reload(), 1500);
        } else {
          dot.classList.remove("online");
          text.textContent = "No internet connection";
        }
      }

      // Listen for online/offline events
      window.addEventListener("online", updateOnlineStatus);
      window.addEventListener("offline", updateOnlineStatus);

      // Initial check
      updateOnlineStatus();

      // Show cached pages
      async function showCachedPages() {
        if ("caches" in window) {
          try {
            const cacheNames = await caches.keys();
            const cachedUrls = new Set();

            for (const cacheName of cacheNames) {
              const cache = await caches.open(cacheName);
              const keys = await cache.keys();

              keys.forEach((request) => {
                const url = new URL(request.url);
                if (url.pathname.endsWith(".html") || url.pathname === "/") {
                  cachedUrls.add(url.pathname);
                }
              });
            }

            if (cachedUrls.size > 0) {
              const container = document.getElementById("cached-pages");
              const list = document.getElementById("cached-list");

              const pageNames = {
                "/": "Home",
                "/index.html": "Home",
                "/properties.html": "Properties",
                "/about.html": "About Us",
                "/contact.html": "Contact",
                "/apply.html": "Apply",
                "/resources.html": "Resources",
                "/faq.html": "FAQ",
                "/impact.html": "Our Impact",
                "/transparency.html": "Transparency",
              };

              cachedUrls.forEach((url) => {
                const name =
                  pageNames[url] || url.replace(".html", "").replace("/", "");
                if (name && url !== "/offline.html") {
                  const li = document.createElement("li");
                  li.innerHTML = `<a href="${url}">${name}</a>`;
                  list.appendChild(li);
                }
              });

              if (list.children.length > 0) {
                container.style.display = "block";
              }
            }
          } catch (error) {
            console.error("Error checking cached pages:", error);
          }
        }
      }

      showCachedPages();
    </script>
  </body>
</html>
