<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">

<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Privacy Policy - Properties 4 Creations</title>
    <link rel="manifest" href="/manifest.json">
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="/css/style.css">
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://unpkg.com/lucide@latest/dist/umd/lucide.css"
        integrity="sha384-sha384-GGE05hfBHktPnRBuvrQUr4zlWkq0EU1L8niEW9sctrgzmzYcAWFcIo2ywmkZa0Hu"
        crossorigin="anonymous">
    <meta name="msapplication-TileColor" content="#0B1120">
    <meta name="description"
        content="Properties 4 Creations privacy policy for veteran housing applications and services in East Texas.">
</head>

<body>
    <!-- Skip Link -->
    <a href="#main" class="skip-link">Skip to main content</a>

    <!-- HEADER -->
    <header class="header-glass">
        <nav class="navbar">
            <div class="nav-container">
                <div class="nav-brand">
                    <h1>Properties 4 Creations</h1>
                </div>
                <button class="menu-toggle" aria-label="Toggle navigation menu">
                    <i data-lucide="menu"></i>
                    <i data-lucide="x"></i>
                </button>
                <ul class="nav-menu" id="nav-menu">
                    <li><a href="index.html" class="nav-link">Home</a></li>
                    <li><a href="properties.html" class="nav-link">Properties</a></li>
                    <li><a href="resources.html" class="nav-link">Resources</a></li>
                    <li><a href="transparency.html" class="nav-link">Transparency</a></li>
                    <li><a href="impact.html" class="nav-link">Impact</a></li>
                    <li><a href="apply.html" class="nav-link">Apply Now</a></li>
                    <li><a href="contact.html" class="nav-link">Contact</a></li>
                </ul>
            </div>
        </nav>
    </header>

    <main id="main">
        <!-- PAGE HEADER -->
        <section class="page-banner"
            style="background-image: url('/images/banners/hero-privacy-banner.webp'); background-size: cover; background-position: center;">
            <div class="container">
                <h1>Privacy Policy</h1>
                <p>How we protect and use your personal information</p>
            </div>
        </section>

        <!-- PRIVACY CONTENT -->
        <section class="privacy-container container">
            <div class="resources-header">
                <p class="last-updated"><strong>Last Updated: December 14, 2025</strong></p>
            </div>

            <div class="privacy-content">
                <div class="privacy-section">
                    <h2>Overview</h2>
                    <p>Properties 4 Creations ("we," "our," or "us") is committed to protecting the privacy and security
                        of your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and
                        safeguard your information when you use our website, apply for housing, or interact with our
                        services.</p>
                    <p>We are a veteran-owned housing provider specializing in premium, renovated homes for veterans and
                        families in East Texas. We comply with all applicable privacy laws and regulations, including
                        the Fair Housing Act and Texas privacy laws.</p>
                </div>

                <div class="privacy-section">
                    <h2>Information We Collect</h2>

                    <h3>Personal Information</h3>
                    <p>We may collect the following types of personal information:</p>
                    <ul>
                        <li><strong>Contact Information:</strong> Name, phone number, email address, mailing address
                        </li>
                        <li><strong>Demographic Information:</strong> Date of birth, household size, income information
                        </li>
                        <li><strong>Housing Information:</strong> Housing assistance program participation, voucher
                            details</li>
                        <li><strong>Military Service Information:</strong> Branch of service, discharge status (for
                            veteran applicants)</li>
                        <li><strong>Housing Preferences:</strong> Preferred property types, accessibility needs, move-in
                            timeline</li>
                        <li><strong>Communication Records:</strong> Messages, questions, and feedback you send to us
                        </li>
                    </ul>

                    <h3>Automatically Collected Information</h3>
                    <p>When you visit our website, we may automatically collect:</p>
                    <ul>
                        <li><strong>Usage Data:</strong> Pages visited, time spent on pages, click patterns</li>
                        <li><strong>Technical Data:</strong> IP address, browser type, operating system, device type
                        </li>
                        <li><strong>Analytics:</strong> Google Analytics data for website improvement</li>
                    </ul>
                </div>

                <div class="privacy-section">
                    <h2>How We Use Your Information</h2>
                    <p>We use collected information for the following purposes:</p>

                    <h3>Housing Services</h3>
                    <ul>
                        <li>Process housing applications and determine eligibility</li>
                        <li>Verify income and voucher information with housing authorities</li>
                        <li>Match applicants with suitable properties</li>
                        <li>Manage lease agreements and property assignments</li>
                        <li>Coordinate move-in processes and property showings</li>
                    </ul>

                    <h3>Communication</h3>
                    <ul>
                        <li>Respond to inquiries and provide customer support</li>
                        <li>Send important updates about applications and properties</li>
                        <li>Provide information about housing programs and resources</li>
                        <li>Share transparency reports and property information</li>
                    </ul>

                    <h3>Legal Compliance</h3>
                    <ul>
                        <li>Comply with Fair Housing laws and anti-discrimination requirements</li>
                        <li>Meet reporting requirements for housing programs</li>
                        <li>Maintain accurate records for landlord-tenant relationships</li>
                        <li>Protect against fraud and ensure tenant safety</li>
                    </ul>

                    <h3>Website Improvement</h3>
                    <ul>
                        <li>Analyze website usage to improve user experience</li>
                        <li>Debug technical issues and ensure site functionality</li>
                        <li>Personalize content based on housing interests</li>
                    </ul>
                </div>

                <div class="privacy-section">
                    <h2>Information Sharing and Disclosure</h2>
                    <p>We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share
                        information only in the following circumstances:</p>

                    <h3>Housing Program Verification</h3>
                    <ul>
                        <li><strong>HUD and VA:</strong> Verify voucher status and eligibility with HUD-VASH
                            coordinators or VA representatives</li>
                        <li><strong>Public Housing Authorities:</strong> Confirm Section 8 voucher validity and
                            compliance</li>
                        <li><strong>Background Check Providers:</strong> Conduct tenant screening for safety and
                            compliance</li>
                    </ul>

                    <h3>Legal Requirements</h3>
                    <ul>
                        <li>Respond to subpoenas, court orders, or legal requirements</li>
                        <li>Report suspected fraud, criminal activity, or safety threats</li>
                        <li>Comply with government housing program audits and reporting</li>
                    </ul>

                    <h3>Service Providers</h3>
                    <ul>
                        <li>Property management software providers (with data protection agreements)</li>
                        <li>Professional services (legal, accounting) under confidentiality agreements</li>
                        <li>Website hosting and maintenance providers</li>
                    </ul>
                </div>

                <div class="privacy-section">
                    <h2>Data Security</h2>
                    <p>We implement appropriate technical, administrative, and physical security measures to protect
                        your personal information:</p>

                    <h3>Technical Protections</h3>
                    <ul>
                        <li>SSL/TLS encryption for data transmission</li>
                        <li>Secure data storage with access controls</li>
                        <li>Regular security audits and updates</li>
                        <li>Multi-factor authentication for staff access</li>
                    </ul>

                    <h3>Administrative Protections</h3>
                    <ul>
                        <li>Limited access to personal information on need-to-know basis</li>
                        <li>Staff training on privacy and security procedures</li>
                        <li>Regular security awareness programs</li>
                        <li>Incident response and breach notification procedures</li>
                    </ul>

                    <h3>Physical Protections</h3>
                    <ul>
                        <li>Secure office facilities with access controls</li>
                        <li>Document storage in locked cabinets</li>
                        <li>Secure disposal of physical records</li>
                    </ul>
                </div>

                <div class="privacy-section">
                    <h2>Your Rights and Choices</h2>

                    <h3>Access and Correction</h3>
                    <p>You have the right to:</p>
                    <ul>
                        <li>Request access to your personal information we maintain</li>
                        <li>Request correction of inaccurate or incomplete information</li>
                        <li>Receive a copy of your information in a portable format</li>
                    </ul>

                    <h3>Communication Preferences</h3>
                    <p>You may:</p>
                    <ul>
                        <li>Opt out of marketing communications (though we rarely send these)</li>
                        <li>Choose how you wish to be contacted for application updates</li>
                        <li>Update your contact information at any time</li>
                    </ul>

                    <h3>Data Deletion</h3>
                    <p>You can request deletion of your information, though we may retain certain information as
                        required by law or for legitimate business purposes, such as:</p>
                    <ul>
                        <li>Completed lease records (for legal compliance)</li>
                        <li>Financial records (for tax and accounting purposes)</li>
                        <li>Communications about safety or legal matters</li>
                    </ul>
                </div>

                <div class="privacy-section">
                    <h2>Cookies and Tracking</h2>
                    <p>Our website uses cookies and similar technologies:</p>

                    <h3>Essential Cookies</h3>
                    <ul>
                        <li>Remember your session and security preferences</li>
                        <li>Enable website functionality and navigation</li>
                        <li>Process applications and forms</li>
                    </ul>

                    <h3>Analytics Cookies</h3>
                    <ul>
                        <li>Google Analytics to understand website usage</li>
                        <li>Help improve user experience</li>
                        <li>Identify technical issues</li>
                    </ul>

                    <p>You can manage cookie preferences through your browser settings, though disabling essential
                        cookies may affect website functionality.</p>
                </div>

                <div class="privacy-section">
                    <h2>Children's Privacy</h2>
                    <p>Our services are intended for adults 18 years and older. We do not knowingly collect personal
                        information from children under 18. If we become aware that we have collected information from a
                        child, we will delete it immediately.</p>
                </div>

                <div class="privacy-section">
                    <h2>Changes to This Policy</h2>
                    <p>We may update this Privacy Policy periodically to reflect changes in our practices or applicable
                        laws. We will:</p>
                    <ul>
                        <li>Post the updated policy on our website</li>
                        <li>Update the "Last Updated" date above</li>
                        <li>Notify you of significant changes via email or website notice</li>
                        <li>Continue to respect the privacy choices you've made</li>
                    </ul>
                </div>

                <div class="privacy-section">
                    <h2>Contact Us About Privacy</h2>
                    <p>If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us:</p>

                    <div class="contact-methods">
                        <p><strong>Properties 4 Creations</strong><br>
                            Privacy Officer<br>
                            Tyler, Texas</p>

                        <p><strong>Email:</strong> privacy@properties4creations.com<br>
                            <strong>Phone:</strong> (903) 555-1234
                        </p>
                    </div>

                    <p>Response Time: We respond to privacy inquiries within 48 hours.</p>
                </div>

                <div class="privacy-section">
                    <h2>Complaints and Dispute Resolution</h2>
                    <p>If you believe your privacy rights have been violated:</p>
                    <ul>
                        <li>Contact us directly first for resolution</li>
                        <li>File a complaint with the Texas Attorney General's Office</li>
                        <li>Report housing discrimination to HUD (fairhousing@HUD.gov)</li>
                        <li>Contact appropriate state or federal regulatory agencies</li>
                    </ul>
                </div>
            </div>
        </section>
    </main>

        <!-- RESOURCES SECTION -->
        <section id="resources" class="resources-section">
            <div class="resources-container container">
                <div class="resources-header">
                    <h1>Housing Resources</h1>
                    <p>Learn about programs and requirements to help you find your home.</p>
                </div>

                <div class="program-card">
                    <h3>🎖️ HUD-VASH (Veterans Affairs Supportive Housing)</h3>
                    <p>A collaborative program between the VA and HUD providing rental assistance and supportive
                        services to homeless veterans and their families.</p>
                    <ul>
                        <li><strong>Eligibility:</strong> Must be a veteran with a housing crisis due to homelessness or
                            at-risk homelessness</li>
                        <li><strong>Income Requirement:</strong> Income at or below 50% of Area Median Income (AMI)</li>
                        <li><strong>Our Role:</strong> We accept HUD-VASH vouchers and provide quality housing without
                            discrimination</li>
                        <li><strong>Process:</strong> Veterans are referred by the VA after receiving a voucher</li>
                    </ul>
                </div>

                <div class="program-card">
                    <h3>🏠 Section 8 Housing Choice Vouchers</h3>
                    <p>The most common rental assistance program for very low-income families, elderly, and disabled
                        persons.</p>
                    <ul>
                        <li><strong>Eligibility:</strong> Income at or below 50% of Area Median Income (AMI)</li>
                        <li><strong>East Texas Example:</strong> For a single person in Longview/Tyler, max income ≈
                            $19,750/year</li>
                        <li><strong>Our Acceptance:</strong> 100% Section 8 acceptance - we welcome voucher holders</li>
                        <li><strong>Timeline:</strong> Waitlists vary by housing authority; some are currently closed
                        </li>
                    </ul>

                    <div class="eligibility-checklist">
                        <h4>Section 8 Eligibility Checklist:</h4>
                        <div class="checklist-item">
                            <div class="checkbox"></div>
                            <label>Income at or below 50% of Area Median Income</label>
                        </div>
                        <div class="checklist-item">
                            <div class="checkbox"></div>
                            <label>U.S. Citizen or eligible immigrant</label>
                        </div>
                        <div class="checklist-item">
                            <div class="checkbox"></div>
                            <label>Valid Social Security number</label>
                        </div>
                        <div class="checklist-item">
                            <div class="checkbox"></div>
                            <label>No recent evictions for cause (typically last 3 years)</label>
                        </div>
                        <div class="checklist-item">
                            <div class="checkbox"></div>
                            <label>No drug-related criminal history (varies by authority)</label>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>

                <div class="program-card">
                    <h3>🏦 VA Home Loans</h3>
                    <p>A zero-down-payment mortgage program exclusively for eligible veterans, active duty service
                        members, and surviving spouses.</p>
                    <ul>
                        <li><strong>Benefits:</strong> No down payment required, no PMI, competitive interest rates</li>
                        <li><strong>Texas VA Loans:</strong> Up to $806,000 or more depending on county</li>
                        <li><strong>Eligibility:</strong> Honorable discharge, active duty 90+ days (or reserves/guard
                            6+ years)</li>
                        <li><strong>Our Support:</strong> We provide financing resources and can guide veteran
                            homebuyers</li>
                    </ul>
                </div>

                <div class="program-card">
                    <h3>📊 SSVF (Supportive Services for Veteran Families)</h3>
                    <p>Case management and financial assistance for veterans and families at risk of homelessness or
                        experiencing homelessness.</p>
                    <ul>
                        <li><strong>Services:</strong> Emergency financial assistance, rental assistance, case
                            management</li>
                        <li><strong>Coverage:</strong> Available through VA partners in East Texas</li>
                        <li><strong>Access:</strong> Contact your local VA office for eligibility and enrollment</li>
                    </ul>
                </div>
            </div>
        </section>

        <!-- TRANSPARENCY SECTION -->
        <section id="transparency" class="transparency-section">
            <div class="transparency-container container">
                <div class="resources-header">
                    <h1>Our Commitment to Quality</h1>
                    <p>Every home is renovated to our rigorous standards, ensuring safety, durability, and comfort for
                        your family.</p>
                </div>

                <div class="quality-standards">
                    <div class="standard-card">
                        <h3>🔧 HVAC System</h3>
                        <ul class="checklist">
                            <li>Fully inspected and certified</li>
                            <li>New or recently serviced</li>
                            <li>Meets all safety codes</li>
                            <li>12-month warranty on parts & labor</li>
                        </ul>
                    </div>

                    <div class="standard-card">
                        <h3>🏘️ Roof System</h3>
                        <ul class="checklist">
                            <li>Complete replacement with warranty</li>
                            <li>Professional installation</li>
                            <li>10-year warranty</li>
                            <li>Inspected for leaks and integrity</li>
                        </ul>
                    </div>

                    <div class="standard-card">
                        <h3>💧 Plumbing System</h3>
                        <ul class="checklist">
                            <li>Copper pipes and modern fixtures</li>
                            <li>Full system inspection</li>
                            <li>Water pressure tested</li>
                            <li>No leaks or blockages</li>
                        </ul>
                    </div>

                    <div class="standard-card">
                        <h3>⚡ Electrical System</h3>
                        <ul class="checklist">
                            <li>Modern safety standards</li>
                            <li>Full panel inspection</li>
                            <li>GFCI outlets where required</li>
                            <li>Certified electrician installation</li>
                        </ul>
                    </div>

                    <div class="standard-card">
                        <h3>🪟 Windows & Doors</h3>
                        <ul class="checklist">
                            <li>All operational and sealed</li>
                            <li>Weatherstripping applied</li>
                            <li>Locks functioning properly</li>
                            <li>Energy-efficient upgrade options</li>
                        </ul>
                    </div>

                    <div class="standard-card">
                        <h3>🧹 Interior Finishes</h3>
                        <ul class="checklist">
                            <li>Fresh paint throughout</li>
                            <li>Flooring repaired or replaced</li>
                            <li>Kitchen appliances included</li>
                            <li>Deep cleaned and sanitized</li>
                        </ul>
                    </div>

                                the process simple and respectful.</p>

                                HUD-VASH voucher or are interested in the program, we can help guide you through the
                                process and match you with an appropriate property.</p>
                        </div>

                            <span>What areas do you serve?</span>
                            <span class="faq-icon">▼</span>
                        </div>

                                properties are strategically located to provide access to employment, schools,
                                healthcare, and public transportation.</p>

                    </div>

                    <div class="faq-item">
                        <div class="faq-question">
                            <span>Are all homes recently renovated?</span>
                            <span class="faq-icon">▼</span>
                        </div>
                        <div class="faq-answer">
                            <p>Yes! Every property in our portfolio meets our rigorous renovation standards. We
                                guarantee new or recently serviced HVAC, roofing, electrical, plumbing, and interior
                                finishes. All work is inspected and warrantied.</p>
                        </div>
                    </div>

                    <div class="faq-item">
                        <div class="faq-question">
                            <span>What is your company background?</span>
                            <span class="faq-icon">▼</span>
                        </div>

                                provide safe, dignified housing for veterans and families in East Texas while rebuilding
                                communities one home at a time.</p>
                        </div>
                    </div>

                    <div class="faq-item">

                            <span class="faq-icon">▼</span>
                        </div>
                        <div class="faq-answer">
                            <p>Most applications are reviewed within 24-48 hours. Once we review your information, we'll
                                contact you directly to discuss available properties, answer questions, and move forward
                                with scheduling a viewing if you're a good fit.</p>
                        </div>
                    </div>

                    <div class="faq-item">

                            <span>Do you work with families without vouchers?</span>
                            <span class="faq-icon">▼</span>
                        </div>
                        <div class="faq-answer">
                            <p>We primarily work with Section 8, HUD-VASH, and SSVF voucher holders. If you don't have a
                                voucher yet, we can provide guidance on how to apply and point you toward local housing
                                authorities and resources.</p>

<footer class="footer">
  <div class="container">

    <!-- PWA Service Worker -->
    <script>
        if ('serviceWorker' in navigator) {
            navigator.serviceWorker.register('sw.js').catch(err => console.log('SW registration failed:', err));
        }
    </script>

    <!-- SCRIPTS -->
    <script defer>
        // MOBILE MENU TOGGLE
        const menuToggle = document.querySelector('.menu-toggle');
        const navMenu = document.getElementById('nav-menu');
        const navLinks = document.querySelectorAll('.nav-link');

        menuToggle.addEventListener('click', () => {
            navMenu.classList.toggle('active');
            menuToggle.classList.toggle('active');
        });

        navLinks.forEach(link => {
            link.addEventListener('click', () => {
                navMenu.classList.remove('active');
                menuToggle.classList.remove('active');
            });
        });

        // PROPERTIES DATA WITH REAL IMAGES
        const propertiesData = [
            {
                name: 'Tyler Ranch Home',
                bedrooms: 3,
                bathrooms: 2,
                price: 'Section 8 Ready',
                tags: ['Section 8 Ready', 'Newly Renovated', 'HVAC New'],
                location: 'Tyler, TX',
                image: '"/images/properties/properties-tyler-ranch-home.webp'
            },
            {
                name: 'Longview Victorian',
                bedrooms: 4,
                bathrooms: 2.5,
                price: 'HUD-VASH Ready',
                tags: ['HUD-VASH Approved', 'Historic Home', 'New Roof'],
                location: 'Longview, TX',
                image: '"/images/properties/properties-longview-victorian.webp'
            },
            {
                name: 'Marshall Farmhouse',
                bedrooms: 3,
                bathrooms: 1.5,
                price: 'Section 8 Ready',
                tags: ['Section 8 Ready', 'Family Friendly', 'Yard Space'],
                location: 'Marshall, TX',
                image: '"/images/properties/properties-marshall-farmhouse.webp'
            },
            {
                name: 'Kemp Townhome',
                bedrooms: 2,
                bathrooms: 1,
                price: 'Section 8/HUD-VASH',
                tags: ['Both Programs', 'Modern Build', 'Energy Efficient'],
                location: 'Kemp, TX',
                image: '"/images/properties/properties-kemp-townhome.webp'
            },
            {
                name: 'Jefferson Riverfront',
                bedrooms: 3,
                bathrooms: 2,
                price: 'HUD-VASH Ready',
                tags: ['Veteran Focused', 'Scenic Location', 'Newly Renovated'],
                location: 'Jefferson, TX',
                image: '"/images/properties/properties-jefferson-river-front.webp'
            },
            {
                name: 'Mineola Studio',
                bedrooms: 1,
                bathrooms: 1,
                price: 'Section 8 Ready',
                tags: ['Section 8 Ready', 'Affordable', 'Modern Amenities'],
                location: 'Mineola, TX',
                image: '"/images/properties/properties-mineola-studio.webp'
            }
        ];

        // POPULATE PROPERTIES GRID
        const propertiesGrid = document.getElementById('properties-grid');
        propertiesData.forEach(prop => {
            const card = document.createElement('div');
            card.className = 'property-card';
            card.innerHTML = `
                <div class="property-image" style="background-image: url('${prop.image}'); background-size: cover; background-position: center;" alt="${prop.name}"></div>
                <div class="property-content">
                    <h3 class="property-title">${prop.name}</h3>
                    <p style="color: var(--dark-gray); font-size: 0.9rem; margin-bottom: 1rem;">${prop.location}</p>
                    <div class="property-details">
                        <div class="detail-item">
                            <div class="detail-label">Beds</div>
                            <div class="detail-value">${prop.bedrooms}</div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="detail-item">
                            <div class="detail-label">Baths</div>
                            <div class="detail-value">${prop.bathrooms}</div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="detail-item">
                            <div class="detail-label">Status</div>
                            <div class="detail-value" style="font-size: 0.8rem; color: var(--gold);">${prop.price}</div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="property-tags">
                        ${prop.tags.map(tag => `<span class="tag">${tag}</span>`).join('')}
                    </div>
                    <button class="btn btn-primary property-btn js-scroll-to" data-target="get-started">Apply for This Home</button>
                </div>
            `;
            propertiesGrid.appendChild(card);
        });

        // FAQ TOGGLE
        const faqItems = document.querySelectorAll('.faq-item');
        faqItems.forEach(item => {
            const question = item.querySelector('.faq-question');
            question.addEventListener('click', () => {
                faqItems.forEach(otherItem => {
                    if (otherItem !== item) {
                        otherItem.classList.remove('active');
                    }
                });
                item.classList.toggle('active');
            });
        });

        // FORM VALIDATION
        const form = document.getElementById('application-form');
        const successMessage = document.getElementById('success-message');

        form.addEventListener('submit', (e) => {
            e.preventDefault();

            let isValid = true;
            const formGroups = form.querySelectorAll('.form-group');

            formGroups.forEach(group => {
                const input = group.querySelector('input, select, textarea');
                if (!input) return;

                group.classList.remove('error');

                if (input.required && !input.value.trim()) {
                    group.classList.add('error');
                    isValid = false;
                } else if (input.type === 'email' && input.value && !/^[^\s@]+@[^\s@]+\.[^\s@]+$/.test(input.value)) {
                    group.classList.add('error');
                    isValid = false;
                } else if (input.id === 'phone' && input.value && !/^[0-9\-\+\(\)\s]+$/.test(input.value)) {
                    group.classList.add('error');
                    isValid = false;
                } else if (input.type === 'checkbox' && !input.checked) {
                    group.classList.add('error');
                    isValid = false;
                }
            });

            if (isValid) {
                // Track GA4 event
                if (window.gtag) {
                    const applicantType = document.getElementById('applicant-type').value;
                    gtag('event', 'generate_lead', {
                        applicant_type: applicantType,
                        value: applicantType === 'veteran' ? 800 : 600
                    });
                }

                successMessage.classList.add('show');
                form.style.display = 'none';

                console.log('Form submitted:', new FormData(form));

                setTimeout(() => {
                    form.reset();
                    form.style.display = 'block';
                    successMessage.classList.remove('show');
                }, 3000);
            }
        });

        // MAP INITIALIZATION
        if (document.getElementById('map')) {
            const script = document.createElement('script');
            script.src = 'https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/leaflet@1.9.4/dist/leaflet.js';
            script.onload = () => {
                const map = L.map('map').setView([32.35, -95.3], 10);
                L.tileLayer('https://{s}.tile.openstreetmap.org/{z}/{x}/{y}.png', {
                    attribution: '© OpenStreetMap contributors',
                    maxZoom: 19
                }).addTo(map);

                L.marker([32.351, -95.301], {
                    title: 'Tyler Properties'
                }).addTo(map).bindPopup('<b>Tyler, TX</b><br>Multiple Properties Available');

                L.marker([32.50, -94.74], {
                    title: 'Longview Properties'
                }).addTo(map).bindPopup('<b>Longview, TX</b><br>Multiple Properties Available');
            };
            document.head.appendChild(script);
        }

        // GA4 TRACKING
        window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
        function gtag() { dataLayer.push(arguments); }
        gtag('js', new Date());
        gtag('config', 'G-XXXXX');

        // TRACK PROPERTY VIEWS
        document.querySelectorAll('.property-card').forEach(card => {
            card.addEventListener('click', () => {
                if (window.gtag) {
                    gtag('event', 'property_view', {
                        property_name: card.querySelector('.property-title').textContent
                    });
                }
            });
        });

        // CONTACT FORM HANDLING
        const contactForm = document.getElementById('contact-form');
        const contactSuccess = document.getElementById('contact-success');

        if (contactForm) {
            contactForm.addEventListener('submit', (e) => {
                e.preventDefault();

                let isValid = true;
                const contactFormGroups = contactForm.querySelectorAll('.form-group');

                contactFormGroups.forEach(group => {
                    const input = group.querySelector('input, textarea');
                    if (!input) return;

                    group.classList.remove('error');

                    if (input.required && !input.value.trim()) {
                        group.classList.add('error');
                        isValid = false;
                    } else if (input.type === 'email' && input.value && !/^[^\s@]+@[^\s@]+\.[^\s@]+$/.test(input.value)) {
                        group.classList.add('error');
                        isValid = false;
                    }
                });

                if (isValid) {
                    if (window.gtag) {
                        gtag('event', 'contact_inquiry', {
                            subject: document.getElementById('contact-subject').value
                        });
                    }

                    contactSuccess.style.display = 'block';
                    contactForm.style.display = 'none';

                    console.log('Contact form submitted:', new FormData(contactForm));

                    setTimeout(() => {
                        contactForm.reset();
                        contactForm.style.display = 'block';
                        contactSuccess.style.display = 'none';
                    }, 3000);
                }
            });
        }

        // ACCESSIBILITY ENHANCEMENTS
        const skipLink = document.querySelector('.skip-link');
        if (!skipLink) {
            const newSkipLink = document.createElement('a');
            newSkipLink.href = '#main-content';
            newSkipLink.textContent = 'Skip to main content';
            newSkipLink.className = 'skip-link';
            document.body.prepend(newSkipLink);
        }

        // Alt text checker
        console.log('Checking alt text...');
        document.querySelectorAll('img').forEach(img => {
            if (!img.alt) {
                console.warn('Image missing alt text:', img.src);
            }
        });
    </script>
</body>

</html>

    <!-- HEADER -->
    <nav class="navbar" role="navigation" aria-label="Main navigation">
    <div class="nav-container">
        <div class="nav-brand">
            <a href="/" class="brand-link">
                <img src="/images/logo/brand-logo-header-footer.svg" alt="Properties 4 Creations Logo" class="brand-logo">
                <span class="brand-text">Properties 4 Creations</span>
            </a>
        </div>

        <button class="menu-toggle" aria-label="Toggle navigation menu" aria-expanded="false">
            <span></span>
            <span></span>
            <span></span>
        </button>

        <ul class="nav-menu" id="nav-menu">
            <li><a href="/" class="nav-link">Home</a></li>
            <li><a href="/properties/" class="nav-link">Properties</a></li>
            <li><a href="/about/" class="nav-link">About</a></li>
            <li><a href="/resources/" class="nav-link">Resources</a></li>
            <li><a href="/contact/" class="nav-link">Contact</a></li>
            <li><a href="/apply/" class="btn btn-primary cta-link">Apply Now</a></li>
        </ul>
    </div>
</nav>


    <main id="main-content">
        <!-- RESOURCES HEADER -->
        <section class="resources-header"
            style="background-image: url('/images/banners/hero-about-us-banner.webp'); background-size: cover; background-position: center;">
            <div class="container">
                <h1>Housing Resources</h1>
                <p>Learn about programs and requirements to help you find your home.</p>
            </div>
        </section>

        <!-- PROGRAM CARDS -->
        <section class="resources-container">
            <div class="program-card">
                <h3><i data-lucide="shield"></i> HUD-VASH (Veterans Affairs Supportive Housing)</h3>
                <p>A collaborative program between the VA and HUD providing rental assistance and supportive services to
                    homeless veterans and their families.</p>
                <ul>
                    <li><strong>Eligibility:</strong> Must be a veteran with a housing crisis due to homelessness or
                        at-risk homelessness</li>
                    <li><strong>Income Requirement:</strong> Income at or below 50% of Area Median Income (AMI)</li>
                    <li><strong>Our Role:</strong> We accept HUD-VASH vouchers and provide quality housing without
                        discrimination</li>
                    <li><strong>Process:</strong> Veterans are referred by the VA after receiving a voucher</li>
                </ul>
            </div>

            <div class="program-card">
                <h3><i data-lucide="home"></i> Section 8 Housing Choice Vouchers</h3>
                <p>The most common rental assistance program for very low-income families, elderly, and disabled
                    persons.</p>
                <ul>
                    <li><strong>Eligibility:</strong> Income at or below 50% of Area Median Income (AMI)</li>
                    <li><strong>East Texas Example:</strong> For a single person in Longview/Tyler, max income ≈
                        $19,750/year</li>
                    <li><strong>Our Acceptance:</strong> 100% Section 8 acceptance - we welcome voucher holders</li>
                    <li><strong>Timeline:</strong> Waitlists vary by housing authority; some are currently closed</li>
                </ul>

                <div class="eligibility-checklist">
                    <h4>Section 8 Eligibility Checklist:</h4>
                    <div class="checklist-item">
                        <div class="checkbox"></div>
                        <label>Income at or below 50% of Area Median Income</label>
                    </div>
                    <div class="checklist-item">
                        <div class="checkbox"></div>
                        <label>U.S. Citizen or eligible immigrant</label>
                    </div>
                    <div class="checklist-item">
                        <div class="checkbox"></div>
                        <label>Valid Social Security number</label>
                    </div>
                    <div class="checklist-item">
                        <div class="checkbox"></div>
                        <label>No recent evictions for cause (typically last 3 years)</label>
                    </div>
                    <div class="checklist-item">
                        <div class="checkbox"></div>
                        <label>No drug-related criminal history (varies by authority)</label>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>

            <div class="program-card">
                <h3><i data-lucide="dollar-sign"></i> VA Home Loans</h3>
                <p>A zero-down-payment mortgage program exclusively for eligible veterans, active duty service members,
                    and surviving spouses.</p>
                <ul>
                    <li><strong>Benefits:</strong> No down payment required, no PMI, competitive interest rates</li>
                    <li><strong>Texas VA Loans:</strong> Up to $806,000 or more depending on county</li>
                    <li><strong>Eligibility:</strong> Honorable discharge, active duty 90+ days (or reserves/guard 6+
                        years)</li>
                    <li><strong>Our Support:</strong> We provide financing resources and can guide veteran homebuyers
                    </li>
                </ul>
            </div>

            <div class="program-card">
                <h3><i data-lucide="users"></i> SSVF (Supportive Services for Veteran Families)</h3>
                <p>Case management and financial assistance for veterans and families at risk of homelessness or
                    experiencing homelessness.</p>
                <ul>
                    <li><strong>Services:</strong> Emergency financial assistance, rental assistance, case management
                    </li>
                    <li><strong>Coverage:</strong> Available through VA partners in East Texas</li>
                    <li><strong>Access:</strong> Contact your local VA office for eligibility and enrollment</li>
                </ul>
            </div>
        </section>
    </main>

    <!-- FOOTER -->
    <footer class="footer">
        <div class="container">
            <div class="footer-content">

        <section class="page-banner page-banner-terms">
            <div class="container">
                <h1>Terms of Service</h1>
                <p>Agreement for using our housing services and website</p>
            </div>
        </section>

        <!-- TERMS CONTENT -->
        <section class="terms-container container">
            <div class="resources-header">
                <p class="last-updated"><strong>Last Updated: December 14, 2025</strong></p>
            </div>

            <div class="terms-content">
                <div class="terms-section">
                    <h2>Acceptance of Terms</h2>
                    <p>By accessing and using this website operated by Properties 4 Creations ("the Company," "we,"
                        "us," or "our"), you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement.
                        These terms apply to all visitors, users, and others who access or use the service.</p>
                    <p>If you do not agree to these terms, you may not access or use this website or our services. We
                        are a veteran-owned business specializing in premium, renovated housing for veterans and
                        families in East Texas.</p>
                </div>

                <div class="terms-section">
                    <h2>Housing Services Agreement</h2>

                    <h3>Application Process</h3>
                    <p>When you submit an application for housing:</p>
                    <ul>
                        <li>All information provided must be truthful and accurate</li>
                        <li>We reserve the right to verify all information submitted</li>
                        <li>Applications are reviewed in order of completion and suitability</li>
                        <li>We may request additional documentation to verify eligibility</li>
                        <li>Meeting application requirements does not guarantee housing placement</li>
                    </ul>

                    <h3>Eligibility Requirements</h3>
                    <p>To be eligible for our housing services, you must:</p>
                    <ul>
                        <li>Hold a valid housing voucher (Section 8, HUD-VASH, etc.)</li>
                        <li>Meet income requirements as specified by your housing program</li>
                        <li>Pass background checks conducted by licensed screening companies</li>
                        <li>Provide required documentation and certifications</li>
                        <li>Comply with all Fair Housing and program regulations</li>
                    </ul>

                    <h3>Lease Agreements</h3>
                    <p>Successful applicants will be required to:</p>
                    <ul>
                        <li>Sign a residential lease agreement</li>
                        <li>Pay security deposits as required by state law</li>
                        <li>Maintain the property in good condition</li>
                        <li>Comply with all lease terms and conditions</li>
                        <li>Continue to meet program eligibility requirements</li>
                    </ul>
                </div>

                <div class="terms-section">
                    <h2>Website Use Terms</h2>

                    <h3>Permitted Use</h3>
                    <p>You may use our website for:</p>
                    <ul>
                        <li>Browsing available properties and services</li>
                        <li>Submitting housing applications</li>
                        <li>Accessing information about housing programs</li>
                        <li>Communicating with our team</li>
                        <li>Learning about our renovation standards and quality guarantees</li>
                    </ul>

                    <h3>Prohibited Activities</h3>
                    <p>You may not:</p>
                    <ul>
                        <li>Submit false or fraudulent information</li>
                        <li>Use the website for any unlawful purpose</li>
                        <li>Attempt to gain unauthorized access to our systems</li>
                        <li>Interfere with the proper functioning of the website</li>
                        <li>Use automated systems to scrape or download content</li>
                        <li>Impersonate any person or entity</li>
                        <li>Distribute spam or unsolicited communications</li>
                    </ul>

                    <h3>Content and Intellectual Property</h3>
                    <p>All content on this website, including text, images, logos, and design elements:</p>
                    <ul>
                        <li>Is the property of Properties 4 Creations or our licensors</li>
                        <li>Is protected by copyright and other intellectual property laws</li>
                        <li>May not be reproduced, distributed, or modified without permission</li>
                        <li>May be used only for legitimate business purposes</li>
                    </ul>
                </div>

                <div class="terms-section">
                    <h2>Privacy and Data Protection</h2>
                    <p>Your privacy is important to us. Our collection and use of personal information is governed by
                        our Privacy Policy, which is incorporated into these terms by reference. By using our services,
                        you consent to our data practices as outlined in our Privacy Policy.</p>

                    <h3>Information Security</h3>
                    <p>We implement reasonable security measures to protect your information, but:</p>
                    <ul>
                        <li>No method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure</li>
                        <li>We cannot guarantee absolute security of your information</li>
                        <li>You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials</li>
                        <li>You should report any suspected security breaches immediately</li>
                    </ul>
                </div>

                <div class="terms-section">
                    <h2>Fair Housing Compliance</h2>
                    <p>Properties 4 Creations is committed to Fair Housing principles:</p>
                    <ul>
                        <li>We do not discriminate based on race, color, religion, sex, national origin, familial
                            status, or disability</li>
                        <li>We provide reasonable accommodations for applicants with disabilities</li>
                        <li>All housing decisions are based on program eligibility and property suitability</li>
                        <li>We comply with all federal, state, and local fair housing laws</li>
                        <li>Discrimination complaints may be reported to HUD and state agencies</li>
                    </ul>
                </div>

                <div class="terms-section">
                    <h2>Disclaimer of Warranties</h2>
                    <p>Our website and services are provided "as is" and "as available." We disclaim all warranties,
                        including but not limited to:</p>
                    <ul>
                        <li>Implied warranties of merchantability and fitness for a particular purpose</li>
                        <li>Warranties that the website will be error-free or uninterrupted</li>
                        <li>Warranties regarding the accuracy or reliability of content</li>
                        <li>Warranties that defects will be corrected</li>
                    </ul>
                    <p>We do not warrant that our website will meet your specific requirements or that any errors will
                        be corrected.</p>
                </div>

                <div class="terms-section">
                    <h2>Limitation of Liability</h2>
                    <p>To the fullest extent permitted by law, Properties 4 Creations shall not be liable for:</p>
                    <ul>
                        <li>Any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages</li>
                        <li>Loss of profits, data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses</li>
                        <li>Damages resulting from your use or inability to use our services</li>
                        <li>Damages resulting from unauthorized access to your information</li>
                        <li>Any other matter related to our services or website</li>
                    </ul>
                </div>

                <div class="terms-section">
                    <h2>Property Information and Representations</h2>
                    <p>While we strive to provide accurate property information:</p>
                    <ul>
                        <li>Property availability and features may change without notice</li>
                        <li>Images and descriptions are for informational purposes only</li>
                        <li>Actual properties may differ from marketing materials</li>
                        <li>We recommend visiting properties in person before making decisions</li>
                        <li>Renovation standards and warranties are as specified in individual lease agreements</li>
                    </ul>
                </div>

                <div class="terms-section">
                    <h2>Governing Law and Dispute Resolution</h2>
                    <p>These terms are governed by the laws of the State of Texas. Any disputes arising from:</p>
                    <ul>
                        <li>Housing applications or tenancy will be resolved in Texas courts</li>
                        <li>Website use may be subject to binding arbitration</li>
                        <li>Fair housing complaints may be filed with appropriate agencies</li>
                        <li>We encourage direct communication to resolve disputes when possible</li>
                    </ul>
                </div>

                <div class="terms-section">
                    <h2>Changes to Terms</h2>
                    <p>We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Changes will be:</p>
                    <ul>
                        <li>Posted on this page with an updated "Last Updated" date</li>
                        <li>Effective immediately upon posting for website use</li>
                        <li>Communicated to active applicants via email for service-related changes</li>
                        <li>Continued use of our services constitutes acceptance of modified terms</li>
                    </ul>
                </div>

                <div class="terms-section">
                    <h2>Severability</h2>
                    <p>If any provision of these terms is found to be unenforceable or invalid, the remaining provisions
                        will continue to be valid and enforceable to the fullest extent permitted by law.</p>
                </div>

                <div class="terms-section">
                    <h2>Contact Information</h2>
                    <p>If you have questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us:</p>

                    <div class="contact-methods">
                        <p><strong>Properties 4 Creations</strong><br>
                            Legal Department<br>
                            Tyler, Texas</p>

                        <p><strong>Email:</strong> legal@properties4creations.com<br>
                            <strong>Phone:</strong> (903) 555-1234
                        </p>
                    </div>

        <!-- THANK YOU SECTION -->
        <section class="thank-you-section"
            style="margin-top: 60px; min-height: 80vh; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; text-align: center; background-color: var(--beige);">
            <div class="container">
                <div class="thank-you-content">
                    <div class="success-icon">
                        <i data-lucide="check-circle"
                            style="font-size: 8rem; color: var(--gold); margin-bottom: 2rem;"></i>
                    </div>

                    <h1
                        style="font-family: 'Merriweather', serif; font-size: 3rem; color: var(--navy); margin-bottom: 1rem;">
                        Thank You!</h1>
                    <h2
                        style="font-family: 'Merriweather', serif; font-size: 2rem; color: var(--navy); margin-bottom: 1rem;">
                        Your Application Has Been Received</h2>

                    <p
                        style="font-size: 1.2rem; color: var(--dark-gray); margin-bottom: 2rem; max-width: 600px; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;">
                        We've received your housing application and will review it within 24-48 hours. Our veteran team
                        will contact you with next steps.
                    </p>

                    <div class="next-steps"
                        style="background: white; padding: 2rem; border-radius: 10px; box-shadow: 0 4px 12px rgba(11, 17, 32, 0.1); margin: 3rem 0; text-align: left;">
                        <h3
                            style="font-family: 'Merriweather', serif; color: var(--navy); margin-bottom: 1.5rem; text-align: center;">
                            What Happens Next?</h3>

                        <div class="step" style="display: flex; align-items: flex-start; margin-bottom: 1.5rem;">
                            <div class="step-number"
                                style="background: var(--gold); color: var(--navy); width: 30px; height: 30px; border-radius: 50%; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-weight: 700; margin-right: 1rem; flex-shrink: 0;">
                                1</div>
                            <div class="step-content">
                                <h4 style="color: var(--navy); margin-bottom: 0.5rem;">Application Review (24-48 hours)
                                </h4>
                                <p style="color: var(--dark-gray); margin: 0;">Our team will review your application and
                                    verify your voucher information.</p>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                        <div class="step" style="display: flex; align-items: flex-start; margin-bottom: 1.5rem;">
                            <div class="step-number"
                                style="background: var(--gold); color: var(--navy); width: 30px; height: 30px; border-radius: 50%; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-weight: 700; margin-right: 1rem; flex-shrink: 0;">
                                2</div>
                            <div class="step-content">
                                <h4 style="color: var(--navy); margin-bottom: 0.5rem;">Property Matching</h4>
                                <p style="color: var(--dark-gray); margin: 0;">We'll identify properties that match your
                                    needs and voucher requirements.</p>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                        <div class="step" style="display: flex; align-items: flex-start; margin-bottom: 1.5rem;">
                            <div class="step-number"
                                style="background: var(--gold); color: var(--navy); width: 30px; height: 30px; border-radius: 50%; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-weight: 700; margin-right: 1rem; flex-shrink: 0;">
                                3</div>
                            <div class="step-content">
                                <h4 style="color: var(--navy); margin-bottom: 0.5rem;">Property Viewing</h4>
                                <p style="color: var(--dark-gray); margin: 0;">If approved, we'll schedule a viewing of
                                    suitable properties.</p>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                        <div class="step" style="display: flex; align-items: flex-start;">
                            <div class="step-number"
                                style="background: var(--gold); color: var(--navy); width: 30px; height: 30px; border-radius: 50%; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-weight: 700; margin-right: 1rem; flex-shrink: 0;">
                                4</div>
                            <div class="step-content">
                                <h4 style="color: var(--navy); margin-bottom: 0.5rem;">Lease Signing</h4>
                                <p style="color: var(--dark-gray); margin: 0;">Complete the paperwork and move into your
                                    new home!</p>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>

                    <div class="contact-info"
                        style="background: rgba(194, 142, 90, 0.1); padding: 2rem; border-radius: 10px; margin: 2rem 0;">
                        <h3 style="font-family: 'Merriweather', serif; color: var(--navy); margin-bottom: 1rem;">
                            Questions While You Wait?</h3>
                        <p style="margin-bottom: 1.5rem;">Our team is here to help. Don't hesitate to reach out:</p>

                        <div
                            style="display: grid; grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(200px, 1fr)); gap: 1rem;">
                            <div
                                style="background: white; padding: 1rem; border-radius: 8px; border-left: 4px solid var(--gold);">
                                <h5><i data-lucide="phone"></i> Call Us</h5>
                                <p><a href="tel:+19035551234" style="color: var(--gold); font-weight: 600;">(903)
                                        555-1234</a></p>
                            </div>
                            <div
                                style="background: white; padding: 1rem; border-radius: 8px; border-left: 4px solid var(--gold);">

                                </p>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>

                    <div class="helpful-links" style="margin-top: 3rem;">

    <script>
        // THANK YOU PAGE ENHANCEMENTS
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {
            // Animate success icon
            const successIcon = document.querySelector('.success-icon i');
            if (successIcon) {
                successIcon.style.animation = 'pulse 2s ease-in-out 3';
            }

            // Add pulse animation
            const style = document.createElement('style');
            style.textContent = `
                @keyframes pulse {
                    0% { transform: scale(1); }
                    50% { transform: scale(1.1); }
                    100% { transform: scale(1); }
                }
            `;
            document.head.appendChild(style);

            // Track application submission (if analytics is set up)
            if (window.gtag) {
                gtag('event', 'application_submitted', {
                    event_category: 'application',
                    event_label: 'housing_application'
                });
            }
        });
    </script>
</body>

                        <li>New flashing and vent installations</li>
                        <li>Gutters and downspouts included</li>
                        <li>10-year manufacturer warranty</li>
                        <li>Licensed roofing contractors only</li>
                    </ul>
                </div>

                    <ul class="checklist">

                    </ul>
                </div>

                        <li>Complies with all building codes</li>
                    </ul>
                </div>

                    <ul class="checklist">
                        <li>All exterior doors replaced if needed</li>
                        <li>Updated interior doors (smooth operation)</li>
                        <li>New locks and hardware included</li>
                        <li>Weatherstripping applied throughout</li>
                        <li>Warranty on all door hardware</li>
                        <li>Ensure no drafts or gaps</li>
                    </ul>
                </div>

                    <h3><i data-lucide="brush"></i> Interior Finishes</h3>
                    <ul class="checklist">
                        <li>Professional painting throughout</li>
                        <li>New appliances installed and tested</li>
                        <li>Cleaned and sanitized before occupancy</li>
                        <li>All carpet cleaned or replaced</li>
                        <li>Lights and switches replaced</li>
                        <li>Ceiling fans in appropriate rooms</li>
                    </ul>
                </div>

                <div class="standard-card">

                    <ul class="checklist">
                        <li>Smoke detectors in every bedroom</li>
                        <li>Carbon monoxide detector installed</li>
                        <li>Fire extinguishers provided</li>
                        <li>All safety equipment inspected</li>
                        <li>Emergency exit routes clear</li>
                        <li>Access to emergency services</li>
                    </ul>

                        <li>Wide doorways in common areas</li>
                        <li>Accessible bathroom features</li>
                        <li>Accommodations for disabilities considered</li>

                    </ul>

                <p>We believe in complete transparency in how we work. Here's exactly how we transform properties for
                    our veterans and families.</p>

                <div class="process-timeline">
                    <div class="timeline-item">
                        <div class="timeline-number">1</div>
                        <h3>Property Acquisition</h3>
                        <p>Properties are carefully selected based on location, condition, and potential for veteran
                            housing.</p>
                    </div>
                    <div class="timeline-item">
                        <div class="timeline-number">2</div>
                        <h3>Assessment & Planning</h3>

                            cost estimates.</p>
                    </div>
                    <div class="timeline-item">
                        <div class="timeline-number">3</div>
                        <h3>Licensed Contractors</h3>
                        <p>All work is performed by licensed, insured contractors experienced in residential
                            renovations.</p>
                    </div>
                    <div class="timeline-item">
                        <div class="timeline-number">4</div>
                        <h3>Quality Inspections</h3>
                        <p>Independent inspections at multiple stages ensure work meets our standards and local building
                            codes.</p>
                    </div>
                    <div class="timeline-item">
                        <div class="timeline-number">5</div>
                        <h3>Final Certification</h3>
                        <p>Properties receive final inspections and certificates before being made available to
                            applicants.</p>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </section>

                            <li><strong>Plumbing:</strong> $4,000 - $7,000 (copper pipes, fixtures, water heater)</li>
                            <li><strong>Electrical:</strong> $3,000 - $5,000 (panel upgrade, new wiring, fixtures)</li>
                            <li><strong>Interior Finishes:</strong> $3,000 - $6,000 (paint, flooring, appliances)</li>
                            <li><strong>Structural & Safety:</strong> $2,000 - $4,000 (inspections, safety features)
                            </li>
                            <li><strong>Permits & Inspections:</strong> $500 - $1,000 (required by law)</li>
                        </ul>

    <!-- MINI MAP -->
    <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/leaflet@1.9.4/dist/leaflet.js"
        integrity="sha384-sha384-cxOPjt7s7Iz04uaHJceBmS+qpjv2JkIHNVcuOrM+YHwZOmJGBXI00mdUXEq65HTH"
        crossorigin="anonymous"></script>
    <script>
        // Initialize property map
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {
            if (document.getElementById('property-map')) {
                const map = L.map('property-map').setView([32.351, -95.301], 15);
                L.tileLayer('https://{s}.tile.openstreetmap.org/{z}/{x}/{y}.png', {
                    attribution: '© OpenStreetMap contributors'
                }).addTo(map);

                // Add property marker
                L.marker([32.351, -95.301])
                    .addTo(map)
                    .bindPopup('<b>Tyler Ranch Home</b><br>3BR, 2BA - Section 8 Ready')
                    .openPopup();
            }
        });
    </script>

                <div class='mission-content'>
                    <div class='mission-text'>
                        <h2 id='mission-heading'>Our Mission</h2>
                        <p>
                            Properties 4 Creations exists to honor the service of veterans
                            and families by providing premium, renovated housing that serves
                            as the foundation for rebuilding lives and strengthening
                            communities across East Texas.
                        </p>

                        <p>
                            Founded and operated by veterans, we understand the unique
                            challenges our fellow service members face when transitioning to
                            civilian life. Stable, quality housing isn't just a need—it's a
                            stepping stone to success.
                        </p>

                        <div class='mission-values' role='list' aria-label='Our core values'>
                            <div class='value-card' role='listitem'>
                                <h3><i data-lucide='shield' aria-hidden='true'></i> Honor</h3>

                                </p>
                            </div>

                                </p>
                            </div>

                <div class='story-content'>
                    <h2 id='story-heading'>Our Story</h2>
                    <div class='story-timeline' role='list' aria-label='Company timeline'>
                        <div class='timeline-item' role='listitem'>
                            <div class='timeline-year'>2020</div>
                            <div class='timeline-content'>
                                <h3>The Beginning</h3>
                                <p>
                                    After witnessing too many veterans struggling with housing
                                    stability, our founder decided to take action. Properties 4
                                    Creations was established with a single mission: provide
                                    quality housing for those who served.
                                </p>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                        <div class='timeline-item' role='listitem'>
                            <div class='timeline-year'>2021</div>
                            <div class='timeline-content'>
                                <h3>First Renovations</h3>
                                <p>
                                    We purchased and renovated our first property in Tyler,
                                    Texas. Every home had to meet our rigorous standards - no
                                    shortcuts, no compromises. The just before first family
                                    moved in Christmas.
                                </p>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                        <div class='timeline-item' role='listitem'>
                            <div class='timeline-year'>2022</div>
                            <div class='timeline-content'>
                                <h3>Growth & Partnerships</h3>
                                <p>
                                    We partnered with the VA and local housing authorities to
                                    become HUD-VASH and Section 8 certified. Our reputation for
                                    quality and veteran-focused service began to grow across
                                    East Texas.
                                </p>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                        <div class='timeline-item' role='listitem'>
                            <div class='timeline-year'>2023</div>
                            <div class='timeline-content'>
                                <h3>Expansion</h3>
                                <p>
                                    We expanded operations to Marshall, Mineola, and Longview.
                                    Our portfolio grew to include townhomes, historic
                                    properties, and modern studios - each renovated with the
                                    same attention to detail and veteran-first approach.
                                </p>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                        <div class='timeline-item' role='listitem'>
                            <div class='timeline-year'>2024</div>
                            <div class='timeline-content'>
                                <h3>Recognition</h3>
                                <p>
                                    Properties 4 Creations received recognition from the Texas
                                    Veterans Commission for our outstanding service to the
                                    veteran community. We continue to grow while maintaining our
                                    core values and commitment to excellence.
                                </p>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </section>

    <script src='https://unpkg.com/lucide@latest/dist/umd/lucide.js'></script>

    <script>
        // Initialize Lucide icons
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {
            if (typeof lucide !== 'undefined') {
                lucide.createIcons();
            }
        });
    </script>
</body>

</html>
