    <!-- SCRIPTS -->
    <script src='https://unpkg.com/lucide@latest/dist/umd/lucide.js'
        integrity='sha384-sha384-XcPm71GSOvViJoCA7WCb/9rSD/M3VBABxIZH30y7wbDtwRymtm2Dw2NTumuGrJqB'
        crossorigin='anonymous'></script>
    <script>
        lucide.createIcons();
    </script>
    <script src='/js/main.js'></script>

    <script>
        // APPLICATION FORM JAVASCRIPT
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {
            const form = document.getElementById('application-form');
            const successMessage = document.getElementById('success-message');
            const applicantType = document.getElementById('applicant-type');
            const militaryGroup = document.getElementById('military-service-group');

            // Hide success message by default
            successMessage.style.display = 'none';

            // Show/hide military service field based on applicant type
            applicantType.addEventListener('change', function () {
                if (this.value === 'veteran' || this.value === 'spouse') {
                    militaryGroup.style.display = 'block';
                    document.getElementById('military-service').required = true;
                } else {
                    militaryGroup.style.display = 'none';
                    document.getElementById('military-service').required = false;
                }
            });

            form.addEventListener('submit', function (e) {
                e.preventDefault();

                let isValid = true;
                const formGroups = form.querySelectorAll('.form-group');

                formGroups.forEach((group) => {
                    const input = group.querySelector('input, select, textarea');
                    const errorMessage = group.querySelector('.error-message');

                    if (
                        input &&
                        input.hasAttribute('required') &&
                        !input.value.trim()
                    ) {
                        isValid = false;
                        errorMessage.style.display = 'block';
                        input.classList.add('error');
                    } else {
                        errorMessage.style.display = 'none';
                        input.classList.remove('error');
                    }

                    // Email validation
                    if (input && input.type === 'email' && input.value) {
                        const emailRegex = /^[^\s@]+@[^\s@]+\.[^\s@]+$/;
                        if (!emailRegex.test(input.value)) {
                            isValid = false;
                            errorMessage.textContent = 'Please enter a valid email address';
                            errorMessage.style.display = 'block';
                            input.classList.add('error');
                        }
                    }

                    // Phone validation
                    if (input && input.type === 'tel' && input.value) {
                        const phoneRegex = /^[0-9\-\+\(\)\s]+$/;
                        if (!phoneRegex.test(input.value)) {
                            isValid = false;
                            errorMessage.textContent = 'Please enter a valid phone number';
                            errorMessage.style.display = 'block';
                            input.classList.add('error');
                        }
                    }
                });

                if (isValid) {
                    // Here you would typically send the form data to a server
                    // For now, we'll just show the success message
                    successMessage.style.display = 'block';
                    form.reset();

                    // Scroll to success message
                    successMessage.scrollIntoView({ behavior: 'smooth' });
                }
            });
        });
    </script>
</body>

</html>

     BUTTON USAGE EXAMPLES

<!-- Basic Button Examples -->

<!-- State Buttons -->
<button class='btn btn-success'>Success</button>
<button class='btn btn-danger'>Delete</button>
<button class='btn btn-warning'>Warning</button>

<!-- Size Variants -->
<button class='btn btn-primary btn-xs'>Extra Small</button>
<button class='btn btn-primary btn-sm'>Small</button>
<button class='btn btn-primary'>Default</button>
<button class='btn btn-primary btn-lg'>Large</button>
<button class='btn btn-primary btn-xl'>Extra Large</button>

  <i data-lucide='home' class='icon icon-left'></i>
  Home
</button>

<button class='btn btn-primary'>
  Next
  <i data-lucide='arrow-right' class='icon icon-right'></i>
</button>

  <i data-lucide='search'></i>
</button>

<!-- Loading State (JavaScript controlled) -->
<button class='btn btn-primary' id='submit-btn'>Submit</button>
<script>
  // Set loading state
  ButtonUtils.setLoading('#submit-btn', 'Processing...');

  // Remove loading state after operation
  setTimeout(() => {
    ButtonUtils.removeLoading('#submit-btn', 'Success!');
  }, 2000);
</script>

<!-- Disabled State -->
<button class='btn btn-primary' disabled>Disabled Button</button>

<!-- Button Group -->
<div class='btn-group' role='group' aria-label='View options'>
  <button class='btn btn-outline active' aria-pressed='true'>List</button>
  <button class='btn btn-outline' aria-pressed='false'>Grid</button>
  <button class='btn btn-outline' aria-pressed='false'>Map</button>
</div>

<!-- Full Width Button -->
<button class='btn btn-primary btn-block'>Full Width Button</button>

<!-- Copy to Clipboard Button -->
<button class='btn btn-secondary' data-copy='Text to copy'>
  <i data-lucide='copy' class='icon icon-left'></i>
  Copy Code
</button>

<!-- Confirmation Button (Destructive) -->
<button class='btn btn-danger' id='delete-btn'>Delete Property</button>
<script>
  ButtonUtils.addConfirmation('#delete-btn', 'Are you sure?', function () {
    // Delete operation here
    console.log('Property deleted');
  });
</script>

<!-- Form Submit Button -->
<form action='/apply' method='POST'>
  <input type='email' name='email' required />
  <button type='submit' class='btn btn-primary btn-lg'>
    Submit Application
  </button>
</form>

<!-- Link styled as Button -->
<a href='/properties' class='btn btn-primary'>Browse Properties</a>

<!-- Context-aware Buttons -->
<div style='background: #0b1120; padding: 2rem'>
  <button class='btn btn-secondary on-dark'>On Dark Background</button>
  <button class='btn btn-ghost on-dark'>Ghost on Dark</button>
</div>

/* ============================================
   BUTTON RIPPLE EFFECT STYLES
   ============================================ */

.btn {
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.btn-ripple {
  position: absolute;
  border-radius: 50%;
  background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.4);
  pointer-events: none;
  transform: scale(0);
  animation: ripple-animation 0.6s ease-out;
}

@keyframes ripple-animation {
  to {
    transform: scale(4);
    opacity: 0;
  }
}

/* Disable ripple for reduced motion */
@media (prefers-reduced-motion: reduce) {
  .btn-ripple {
    display: none;
  }
}

/**
 * Button Component - Properties 4 Creations
 * Enterprise-grade button system with variants, sizes, and states
 */

/* ========================================
   Base Button
   ======================================== */

.btn {
  display: inline-flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  gap: var(--spacing-2);
  padding: var(--spacing-3) var(--spacing-6);
  border: 2px solid transparent;
  border-radius: var(--radius-lg);
  font-family: var(--font-family-sans);
  font-size: var(--font-size-base);
  font-weight: var(--font-weight-semibold);
  line-height: 1.5;
  text-decoration: none;
  text-align: center;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all var(--duration-base) var(--easing-ease-out);
  user-select: none;
  white-space: nowrap;

  /* Ensure 44x44px touch target (WCAG) */
  min-height: 44px;
  min-width: 44px;

  /* Prevent layout shift */
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.btn:focus-visible {
  outline: 3px solid var(--color-primary-gold);
  outline-offset: 4px;
}

.btn:disabled,
.btn[aria-disabled='true'] {
  opacity: 0.5;
  cursor: not-allowed;
  pointer-events: none;
}

/* ========================================
   Button Variants
   ======================================== */

/* Primary Button */
.btn-primary {
  background: linear-gradient(
    135deg,
    var(--color-primary-gold),
    var(--color-primary-gold-light)
  );
  color: var(--color-primary-navy);
  border-color: var(--color-primary-gold);
}

.btn-primary:hover {
  background: var(--color-primary-gold-light);
  transform: translateY(-2px);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-lg);
}

.btn-primary:active {
  transform: translateY(0);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-sm);
}

/* Secondary Button */
.btn-secondary {
  background: transparent;
  color: var(--color-primary-navy);
  border-color: var(--color-primary-navy);
}

.btn-secondary:hover {
  background: var(--color-primary-navy);
  color: var(--color-neutral-white);
}

.btn-secondary:active {
  background: var(--color-primary-navy-dark);
}

/* Tertiary Button (Ghost) */
.btn-tertiary {
  background: transparent;
  color: var(--color-primary-gold);
  border-color: transparent;
}

.btn-tertiary:hover {
  background: rgba(194, 142, 90, 0.1);
}

.btn-tertiary:active {
  background: rgba(194, 142, 90, 0.2);
}

/* Danger Button */
.btn-danger {
  background: var(--color-semantic-error);
  color: var(--color-neutral-white);
  border-color: var(--color-semantic-error);
}

.btn-danger:hover {
  background: #b71c1c;
  transform: translateY(-2px);
  box-shadow: 0 4px 12px rgba(211, 47, 47, 0.4);
}

/* Success Button */
.btn-success {
  background: var(--color-semantic-success);
  color: var(--color-neutral-white);
  border-color: var(--color-semantic-success);
}

.btn-success:hover {
  background: #2e7d32;
  transform: translateY(-2px);
  box-shadow: 0 4px 12px rgba(56, 142, 60, 0.4);
}

/* Outline Variants */
.btn-outline-primary {
  background: transparent;
  color: var(--color-primary-gold);
  border-color: var(--color-primary-gold);
}

.btn-outline-primary:hover {
  background: var(--color-primary-gold);
  color: var(--color-primary-navy);
}

/* ========================================
   Button Sizes
   ======================================== */

.btn-sm {
  padding: var(--spacing-2) var(--spacing-4);
  font-size: var(--font-size-sm);
  min-height: 36px;
}

.btn-lg {
  padding: var(--spacing-4) var(--spacing-8);
  font-size: var(--font-size-lg);
  min-height: 52px;
}

.btn-xl {
  padding: var(--spacing-5) var(--spacing-10);
  font-size: var(--font-size-xl);
  min-height: 60px;
}

.btn-full-width {
  width: 100%;
}

/* ========================================
   Button States
   ======================================== */

/* Loading State */
.btn-loading {
  position: relative;
  color: transparent;
  pointer-events: none;
}

.btn-loading::after {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  width: 20px;
  height: 20px;
  top: 50%;
  left: 50%;
  margin: -10px 0 0 -10px;
  border: 3px solid currentColor;
  border-radius: 50%;
  border-top-color: transparent;
  animation: btn-spin 0.6s linear infinite;
}

.btn-loading.btn-primary::after {
  border-color: var(--color-primary-navy);
  border-top-color: transparent;
}

@keyframes btn-spin {
  to {
    transform: rotate(360deg);
  }
}

/* ========================================
   Ripple Effect (Material Design)
   ======================================== */

.btn-ripple {
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.btn-ripple::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  left: 50%;
  width: 0;
  height: 0;
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
  border-radius: 50%;
  transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
  transition:
    width 0.6s ease-out,
    height 0.6s ease-out;
}

.btn-ripple:active::before {
  width: 300px;
  height: 300px;
}

/* ========================================
   Icon Buttons
   ======================================== */

.btn-icon {
  padding: var(--spacing-3);
  min-width: 44px;
}

.btn-icon svg,
.btn-icon img {
  width: 20px;
  height: 20px;
}

.btn-icon.btn-sm svg,
.btn-icon.btn-sm img {
  width: 16px;
  height: 16px;
}

.btn-icon.btn-lg svg,
.btn-icon.btn-lg img {
  width: 24px;
  height: 24px;
}

/* Icon with text */
.btn svg:first-child,
.btn img:first-child {
  margin-right: var(--spacing-2);
}

.btn svg:last-child,
.btn img:last-child {
  margin-left: var(--spacing-2);
}

/* ========================================
   Button Group
   ======================================== */

.btn-group {
  display: inline-flex;
  gap: var(--spacing-2);
}

.btn-group .btn {
  flex: 1;
}

.btn-group-vertical {
  flex-direction: column;
}

/* Connected button group */
.btn-group-connected {
  gap: 0;
}

.btn-group-connected .btn {
  border-radius: 0;
}

.btn-group-connected .btn:first-child {
  border-radius: var(--radius-lg) 0 0 var(--radius-lg);
}

.btn-group-connected .btn:last-child {
  border-radius: 0 var(--radius-lg) var(--radius-lg) 0;
}

/* ========================================
   Touch Device Optimizations
   ======================================== */

@media (hover: none) and (pointer: coarse) {
  .btn {
    min-height: 48px;
    padding: var(--spacing-4) var(--spacing-6);
  }

  .btn:active {
    transform: scale(0.98);
  }

  .btn-sm {
    min-height: 44px;
    padding: var(--spacing-3) var(--spacing-5);
  }
}

/* ========================================
   Reduced Motion
   ======================================== */

@media (prefers-reduced-motion: reduce) {
  .btn {
    transition: none;
  }

  .btn-ripple::before {
    transition: none;
  }

  .btn-loading::after {
    animation: none;
  }

  .btn:hover {
    transform: none;
  }
}

/* ========================================
   High Contrast Mode
   ======================================== */

@media (prefers-contrast: high) {
  .btn {
    border-width: 3px;
  }

  .btn:focus-visible {
    outline-width: 4px;
  }
}

/**
 * Card Component - Properties 4 Creations
 * Property cards, stat cards, and testimonial cards
 */

/* ========================================
   Base Card
   ======================================== */

.card {
  background: var(--color-neutral-white);
  border-radius: var(--radius-xl);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-sm);
  overflow: hidden;
  transition: all var(--duration-base) var(--easing-ease-out);
}

.card:hover {
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-md);
}

/* ========================================
   Property Card (BEM)
   ======================================== */

.property-card {
  background: var(--color-neutral-white);
  border-radius: var(--radius-xl);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-sm);
  overflow: hidden;
  transition: all var(--duration-base) var(--easing-ease-out);
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
}

.property-card:hover {
  transform: translateY(-4px);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-xl);
}

.property-card:focus-within {
  outline: 3px solid var(--color-primary-gold);
  outline-offset: 2px;
}

/* Property Card Image */
.property-card__image-container {
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
  aspect-ratio: 4 / 3;
}

.property-card__image {
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  object-fit: cover;
  transition: transform var(--duration-slow) var(--easing-ease-out);
}

.property-card:hover .property-card__image {
  transform: scale(1.05);
}

/* Property Card Badge */
.property-card__badge {
  position: absolute;
  top: var(--spacing-3);
  left: var(--spacing-3);
  padding: var(--spacing-1) var(--spacing-3);
  background: var(--color-primary-gold);
  color: var(--color-primary-navy);
  font-size: var(--font-size-xs);
  font-weight: var(--font-weight-bold);
  text-transform: uppercase;
  letter-spacing: var(--letter-spacing-wide);
  border-radius: var(--radius-full);
}

  color: var(--color-neutral-white);
}

  color: var(--color-neutral-white);
}

/* Property Card Content */
.property-card__content {
  padding: var(--spacing-4);
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  flex-grow: 1;
}

.property-card__title {
  font-family: var(--font-family-serif);
  font-size: var(--font-size-xl);
  font-weight: var(--font-weight-bold);
  color: var(--color-primary-navy);
  margin: 0 0 var(--spacing-2) 0;
  line-height: 1.3;
}

.property-card__address {
  font-size: var(--font-size-sm);
  color: var(--color-neutral-gray-600);
  margin: 0 0 var(--spacing-3) 0;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: var(--spacing-1);
}

  width: 16px;
  height: 16px;
  flex-shrink: 0;
}

/* Property Card Features */
.property-card__features {
  display: flex;
  gap: var(--spacing-4);

/* CRITICAL CSS - Above-the-fold styles */
/* Generated automatically for performance optimization */

:root {
  /* Brand Colors */
  --color-primary-navy: #0b1120;
  --color-primary-wood: #c28e5a;
  --color-primary-walnut: #8b5e3c;
  --color-primary-beige: #f5f1e8;

  /* Typography */
  --font-family-primary: 'Inter', -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, sans-serif;
  --font-family-heading: 'Merriweather', Georgia, serif;

  /* Spacing */
  --spacing-xs: 0.25rem;
  --spacing-sm: 0.5rem;
  --spacing-md: 1rem;
  --spacing-lg: 1.5rem;
  --spacing-xl: 2rem;
  --spacing-2xl: 3rem;

  /* Border radius */
  --radius-sm: 0.125rem;
  --radius-md: 0.375rem;
  --radius-lg: 0.5rem;

  /* Shadows */
  --shadow-sm: 0 1px 2px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05);
  --shadow-md: 0 4px 6px -1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
  --shadow-lg: 0 10px 15px -3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);

  /* Transitions */
  --transition-fast: 150ms ease-in-out;
  --transition-normal: 300ms ease-in-out;
  --transition-slow: 500ms ease-in-out;
}

/* Reset and base styles */
*,
*::before,
*::after {
  box-sizing: border-box;
}

  line-height: 1.15;
  -webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;

  color: var(--color-primary-navy);
  scroll-behavior: smooth;
}

  font-size: 1rem;

  text-decoration: none;
  border: none;
  border-radius: var(--radius-md);
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all var(--transition-fast);
  background-color: var(--color-primary-wood);
  color: white;
}

.btn:hover,
.btn:focus {
  background-color: var(--color-primary-walnut);
  color: white;
  text-decoration: none;
  transform: translateY(-1px);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-md);
}

.btn:active {
  transform: translateY(0);
}

.btn-primary {
  background-color: var(--color-primary-wood);
  color: white;
}

  background-color: transparent;
  color: var(--color-primary-wood);
  border: 2px solid var(--color-primary-wood);
}

  background-color: var(--color-primary-wood);

}

/* ============================================
   ENHANCED BUTTON SYSTEM FOR PROPERTIES 4 CREATIONS
   ============================================ */

/* BASE BUTTON STYLES - Enhanced from current implementation */
.btn {
  /* Existing properties preserved */
  padding: var(--btn-padding, 0.75rem 1.5rem);
  border: none;
  border-radius: var(--btn-border-radius, 5px);
  font-weight: var(--btn-font-weight, 600);
  cursor: pointer;
  text-decoration: none;
  display: inline-flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  gap: 0.5rem; /* NEW - spacing for icons */
  font-family: 'Inter', sans-serif;
  font-size: 1rem;
  line-height: 1.5;

  /* Enhanced transitions */
  transition: all 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1);

  /* Improved focus state */
  outline: 2px solid transparent;
  outline-offset: 2px;
  position: relative;

  /* Prevent text selection on clicks */
  user-select: none;
  -webkit-user-select: none;

  /* Better touch targets for mobile */
  min-height: 44px;
  min-width: 44px;
}

/* Enhanced focus states for accessibility */
.btn:focus-visible {
  outline-color: var(--gold);
  outline-offset: 3px;
  outline-width: 3px;
  box-shadow: 0 0 0 4px rgba(194, 142, 90, 0.2);
}

/* Disabled state - CRITICAL ADDITION */
.btn:disabled,
.btn[aria-disabled='true'] {
  opacity: 0.5;
  cursor: not-allowed;
  pointer-events: none;
  filter: grayscale(30%);
}

/* Loading state - NEW FEATURE */
.btn.loading {
  color: transparent;
  pointer-events: none;
  position: relative;
}

  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  width: 16px;
  height: 16px;

  left: 50%;

  margin-top: -8px;

    transform: rotate(360deg);
  }
}

/**
 * Main Stylesheet - Properties 4 Creations
 * Modular CSS architecture with design tokens
 * 
 * This file imports all CSS modules in the correct order.
 * Use PostCSS to bundle and minify for production.
 */

/* ========================================
   Base Styles
   ======================================== */

/* Design Tokens (CSS Custom Properties) */
@import 'base/design-tokens.css';

/* ========================================
   Components
   ======================================== */

/* Buttons */
@import 'components/buttons.css';

/* Cards */
@import 'components/cards.css';

/* Forms */
@import 'components/forms.css';

/* ========================================
   Existing Styles (Legacy)
   Import the existing style.css for backward compatibility
   These will be gradually migrated to modular components
   ======================================== */

/* Note: The existing style.css contains all current styles.
   As we migrate to the new component system, we'll remove
   duplicate styles from style.css and rely on the modular files. */

/* ========================================
   Utility Classes
   ======================================== */

/* Display Utilities */

  display: none !important;
}

  display: block !important;

}
.u-text-gray {
  color: var(--color-neutral-gray-600);
}
.u-text-error {
  color: var(--color-semantic-error);
}
.u-text-success {
  color: var(--color-semantic-success);
}

.u-bg-navy {
  background-color: var(--color-primary-navy);
}
.u-bg-gold {
  background-color: var(--color-primary-gold);
}
.u-bg-beige {
  background-color: var(--color-primary-beige);
}
.u-bg-white {
  background-color: var(--color-neutral-white);
}
.u-bg-gray {
  background-color: var(--color-neutral-gray-100);
}

/* Border Utilities */
.u-rounded {
  border-radius: var(--radius-base);
}
.u-rounded-md {
  border-radius: var(--radius-md);
}
.u-rounded-lg {
  border-radius: var(--radius-lg);
}
.u-rounded-xl {
  border-radius: var(--radius-xl);
}
.u-rounded-full {
  border-radius: var(--radius-full);
}

/* Shadow Utilities */
.u-shadow-none {
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-none);
}
.u-shadow-sm {
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-sm);
}
.u-shadow-md {
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-md);
}
.u-shadow-lg {
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-lg);
}
.u-shadow-xl {
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-xl);
}

/* ========================================
   Print Styles
   ======================================== */

@media print {
  .u-no-print {
    display: none !important;
  }

  body {
    font-size: 12pt;
    line-height: 1.5;
    color: #000;
    background: #fff;
  }

  a {
    text-decoration: underline;
  }

  a[href]::after {
    content: ' (' attr(href) ')';
    font-size: 0.8em;
  }

  .btn {
    border: 1px solid #000;
    background: transparent;
    color: #000;
  }
}

}

}

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
FILE: docs\design-system\DESIGN_PRINCIPLES\index.html
SIZE: 12311 bytes
MODIFIED: 2025-12-20 22:53:35
================================================================================
<h1>Design Principles - Properties 4 Creations</h1>
<h2>Overview</h2>
<p>This document outlines the design principles, visual language, and guidelines for the Properties 4 Creations housing platform serving <strong>families and veterans</strong> in East Texas. These principles ensure consistency, accessibility, and a professional user experience across all touchpoints.</p>
<hr>
<h2>Core Values</h2>
<h3>1. Family &amp; Veteran-First Design</h3>
<ul>
<li>Design with dignity, respect, and accessibility as primary concerns for all families and veterans</li>
<li>Use clear, straightforward language without jargon</li>
<li>Provide multiple pathways to complete tasks</li>
<li>Ensure all critical information is easily discoverable</li>
<li>Consider diverse family structures and needs</li>
<li>Honor veteran service while welcoming all eligible families</li>
</ul>
<h3>2. Transparency &amp; Trust</h3>
<ul>
<li>Clear information hierarchy with honest communication</li>
<li>No hidden fees, terms, or conditions</li>
<li>Progress indicators for multi-step processes</li>
<li>Consistent, predictable interface patterns</li>
</ul>
<h3>3. Accessibility (WCAG 2.2 AA)</h3>
<ul>
<li>Minimum 4.5:1 contrast ratio for all text</li>
<li>44x44px minimum touch targets</li>
<li>Full keyboard navigation support</li>
<li>Screen reader compatibility</li>
<li>Respect user preferences (reduced motion, color scheme)</li>
</ul>
<h3>4. Performance</h3>
<ul>
<li>Core Web Vitals compliance (LCP &lt;2.5s, FID &lt;100ms, CLS &lt;0.1)</li>
<li>Progressive enhancement approach</li>
<li>Offline-first PWA capabilities</li>
<li>Optimized images and assets</li>
</ul>
<hr>
<h2>Visual Language</h2>
<h3>Color Palette</h3>
<h4>Primary Colors</h4>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>Color</th>
<th>Hex</th>
<th>Usage</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>Navy</td>
<td><code>#0B1120</code></td>
<td>Brand, headers, CTAs, primary text</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>Gold</td>
<td><code>#C28E5A</code></td>
<td>Accents, highlights, interactive elements</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>Beige</td>
<td><code>#F5F5F0</code></td>
<td>Backgrounds, cards</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<h4>Semantic Colors</h4>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>Color</th>
<th>Hex</th>
<th>Usage</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>Error</td>
<td><code>#D32F2F</code></td>
<td>Error states, destructive actions</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>Success</td>
<td><code>#388E3C</code></td>
<td>Success states, confirmations</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>Warning</td>
<td><code>#F57C00</code></td>
<td>Warnings, cautions</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>Info</td>
<td><code>#1976D2</code></td>
<td>Informational messages</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<h4>Neutral Colors</h4>
<ul>
<li>White (<code>#FFFFFF</code>) - Card backgrounds, text on dark</li>
<li>Gray scale (<code>#F9FAFB</code> to <code>#111827</code>) - Borders, secondary text, dividers</li>
<li>Black (<code>#000000</code>) - High contrast text when needed</li>
</ul>
<h3>Typography</h3>
<h4>Font Families</h4>
<ul>
<li><strong>Headings</strong>: Merriweather (serif) - Conveys trust and professionalism</li>
<li><strong>Body</strong>: System fonts (-apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto) - Optimal readability</li>
<li><strong>Code</strong>: Monaco, Courier New (monospace) - Technical content</li>
</ul>
<h4>Type Scale</h4>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>Name</th>
<th>Size</th>
<th>Line Height</th>
<th>Usage</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>xs</td>
<td>0.75rem (12px)</td>
<td>1rem</td>
<td>Captions, labels</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>sm</td>
<td>0.875rem (14px)</td>
<td>1.25rem</td>
<td>Secondary text</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>base</td>
<td>1rem (16px)</td>
<td>1.5rem</td>
<td>Body text</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>lg</td>
<td>1.125rem (18px)</td>
<td>1.75rem</td>
<td>Lead paragraphs</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>xl</td>
<td>1.25rem (20px)</td>
<td>1.75rem</td>
<td>H4 headings</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>2xl</td>
<td>1.5rem (24px)</td>
<td>2rem</td>
<td>H3 headings</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>3xl</td>
<td>1.875rem (30px)</td>
<td>2.25rem</td>
<td>H2 headings</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>4xl</td>
<td>2.25rem (36px)</td>
<td>2.5rem</td>
<td>H1 headings</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>5xl</td>
<td>3rem (48px)</td>
<td>1</td>
<td>Hero titles</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<h3>Spacing System</h3>
<p>Based on an 8px grid system for consistent rhythm:</p>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>Token</th>
<th>Value</th>
<th>Usage</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>spacing-1</td>
<td>0.25rem (4px)</td>
<td>Tight spacing, icons</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>spacing-2</td>
<td>0.5rem (8px)</td>
<td>Inline elements</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>spacing-3</td>
<td>0.75rem (12px)</td>
<td>Small gaps</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>spacing-4</td>
<td>1rem (16px)</td>
<td>Standard spacing</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>spacing-6</td>
<td>1.5rem (24px)</td>
<td>Section padding</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>spacing-8</td>
<td>2rem (32px)</td>
<td>Large gaps</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>spacing-12</td>
<td>3rem (48px)</td>
<td>Section margins</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>spacing-16</td>
<td>4rem (64px)</td>
<td>Page sections</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<h3>Shadows</h3>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>Level</th>
<th>Usage</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>xs</td>
<td>Subtle depth for inputs</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>sm</td>
<td>Cards at rest</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>md</td>
<td>Cards on hover</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>lg</td>
<td>Modals, dropdowns</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>xl</td>
<td>Floating elements</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<h3>Border Radius</h3>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>Token</th>
<th>Value</th>
<th>Usage</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>sm</td>
<td>0.125rem</td>
<td>Subtle rounding</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>base</td>
<td>0.25rem</td>
<td>Inputs, small elements</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>md</td>
<td>0.375rem</td>
<td>Buttons</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>lg</td>
<td>0.5rem</td>
<td>Cards</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>xl</td>
<td>0.75rem</td>
<td>Large cards</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>full</td>
<td>9999px</td>
<td>Pills, avatars</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<hr>
<h2>Component Guidelines</h2>
<h3>Buttons</h3>
<h4>Variants</h4>
<ol>
<li><strong>Primary</strong> - Main CTAs (gold background, navy text)</li>
<li><strong>Secondary</strong> - Secondary actions (navy outline)</li>
<li><strong>Tertiary</strong> - Low-emphasis actions (text only)</li>
<li><strong>Danger</strong> - Destructive actions (red)</li>
</ol>
<h4>States</h4>
<ul>
<li>Default, Hover, Active, Focus, Disabled, Loading</li>
</ul>
<h4>Sizing</h4>
<ul>
<li>Small: 36px height, 14px text</li>
<li>Medium: 44px height, 16px text (default)</li>
<li>Large: 52px height, 18px text</li>
</ul>
<h4>Rules</h4>
<ul>
<li>Always include visible focus indicator</li>
<li>Minimum 44x44px touch target</li>
<li>Use loading state for async actions</li>
<li>Include icon + text for important actions</li>
</ul>
<h3>Cards</h3>
<h4>Property Cards</h4>
<ul>
<li>Image with lazy loading</li>
<li>Title (H3)</li>
<li>Address</li>
<li>Features (beds, baths, sqft)</li>
<li>Tags (Section 8, HUD-VASH, Pet Friendly)</li>
<li>CTA button</li>
</ul>
<h4>Hover Effects</h4>
<ul>
<li>Subtle lift (translateY -4px)</li>
<li>Shadow increase</li>
<li>Image zoom (scale 1.05)</li>
</ul>
<h3>Forms</h3>
<h4>Input Fields</h4>
<ul>
<li>Clear labels above inputs</li>
<li>Placeholder text for examples only</li>
<li>Error messages below with icon</li>
<li>Success state on valid input</li>
<li>16px minimum font size (prevents iOS zoom)</li>
</ul>
<h4>Validation</h4>
<ul>
<li>Real-time validation on blur</li>
<li>Clear error messages with recovery path</li>
<li>Use aria-live for screen reader announcements</li>
</ul>
<h3>Navigation</h3>
<h4>Header</h4>
<ul>
<li>Sticky on scroll</li>
<li>Glass morphism effect</li>
<li>Mobile hamburger menu at 768px</li>
<li>Skip navigation link</li>
</ul>
<h4>Mobile Menu</h4>
<ul>
<li>Full-screen overlay</li>
<li>Focus trap when open</li>
<li>Close on Escape key</li>
<li>Animate from left</li>
</ul>
<hr>
<h2>Motion Guidelines</h2>
<h3>Duration</h3>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>Token</th>
<th>Value</th>
<th>Usage</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>instant</td>
<td>0ms</td>
<td>Immediate feedback</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>fast</td>
<td>150ms</td>
<td>Micro-interactions</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>base</td>
<td>250ms</td>
<td>Standard transitions</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>slow</td>
<td>350ms</td>
<td>Complex animations</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>slower</td>
<td>500ms</td>
<td>Page transitions</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<h3>Easing</h3>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>Token</th>
<th>Value</th>
<th>Usage</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>easeOut</td>
<td>cubic-bezier(0, 0, 0.2, 1)</td>
<td>Enter animations</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>easeIn</td>
<td>cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 1, 1)</td>
<td>Exit animations</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>easeInOut</td>
<td>cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1)</td>
<td>Move animations</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>bounce</td>
<td>cubic-bezier(0.68, -0.55, 0.265, 1.55)</td>
<td>Playful feedback</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<h3>Reduced Motion</h3>
<p>Always respect <code>prefers-reduced-motion</code>:</p>
<pre><code class="language-css">@media (prefers-reduced-motion: reduce) {
  * {
    animation-duration: 0.01ms !important;
    transition-duration: 0.01ms !important;
  }
}
</code></pre>
<hr>
<h2>Responsive Design</h2>
<h3>Breakpoints</h3>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>Name</th>
<th>Value</th>
<th>Target</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>xs</td>
<td>320px</td>
<td>Small phones</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>sm</td>
<td>640px</td>
<td>Large phones</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>md</td>
<td>768px</td>
<td>Tablets</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>lg</td>
<td>1024px</td>
<td>Laptops</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>xl</td>
<td>1280px</td>
<td>Desktops</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>2xl</td>
<td>1536px</td>
<td>Large screens</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<h3>Mobile-First Approach</h3>
<p>Write base styles for mobile, then add complexity:</p>
<pre><code class="language-css">/* Mobile (default) */
.grid {
  grid-template-columns: 1fr;
}

/* Tablet */
@media (min-width: 768px) {
  .grid {
    grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);
  }
}

/* Desktop */
@media (min-width: 1024px) {
  .grid {
    grid-template-columns: repeat(3, 1fr);
  }
}
</code></pre>
<hr>
<h2>Accessibility Checklist</h2>
<h3>Color &amp; Contrast</h3>
<ul>
<li>[ ] Text contrast ratio ≥ 4.5:1 (AA)</li>
<li>[ ] Large text contrast ratio ≥ 3:1</li>
<li>[ ] Non-text contrast ratio ≥ 3:1</li>
<li>[ ] Don't rely on color alone for meaning</li>
</ul>
<h3>Keyboard Navigation</h3>
<ul>
<li>[ ] All interactive elements focusable</li>
<li>[ ] Visible focus indicators</li>
<li>[ ] Logical tab order</li>
<li>[ ] Skip navigation link</li>
<li>[ ] Escape closes modals/menus</li>
</ul>
<h3>Screen Readers</h3>
<ul>
<li>[ ] Semantic HTML structure</li>
<li>[ ] Proper heading hierarchy (H1 → H2 → H3)</li>
<li>[ ] Alt text for images</li>
<li>[ ] ARIA labels for icons/buttons</li>
<li>[ ] Live regions for dynamic content</li>
</ul>
<h3>Forms</h3>
<ul>
<li>[ ] Labels associated with inputs</li>
<li>[ ] Error messages linked with aria-describedby</li>
<li>[ ] Required fields marked with aria-required</li>
<li>[ ] Form validation announced</li>
</ul>
<h3>Touch</h3>
<ul>
<li>[ ] 44x44px minimum touch targets</li>
<li>[ ] 8px minimum spacing between targets</li>
<li>[ ] No hover-only interactions</li>
</ul>
<hr>
<h2>File Naming Conventions</h2>
<h3>Images</h3>
<pre><code>[type]-[location]-[description].[ext]
</code></pre>
<p>Examples:</p>
<ul>
<li><code>hero-home-banner.webp</code></li>
<li><code>properties-tyler-ranch-home.webp</code></li>
<li><code>icon-section-8.svg</code></li>
</ul>
<h3>CSS Classes (BEM)</h3>
<pre><code>.block__element--modifier
</code></pre>
<p>Examples:</p>
<ul>
<li><code>.property-card</code></li>
<li><code>.property-card__image</code></li>
<li><code>.property-card--featured</code></li>
</ul>
<h3>JavaScript</h3>
<pre><code>camelCase for variables/functions
PascalCase for classes
UPPER_SNAKE_CASE for constants
</code></pre>
<hr>
<h2>Version History</h2>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>Version</th>
<th>Date</th>
<th>Changes</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>1.0.0</td>
<td>2025-12-15</td>
<td>Initial design system documentation</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<hr>

<li><a href="https://webaim.org/resources/contrastchecker/">WebAIM Contrast Checker</a></li>
<li><a href="https://inclusive-components.design/">Inclusive Components</a></li>
<li><a href="https://www.a11yproject.com/checklist/">A11y Project Checklist</a></li>
</ul>

                                <li>Completing the lease signing process</li>
                            </ol>

                                <strong>Yes, we accept 100% of Section 8 Housing Choice
                                    Vouchers.</strong>
                                We are committed to helping voucher holders find quality
                                housing without discrimination. Here's what you need to know:
                            </p>
                            <ul>
                                <li>We accept vouchers from any housing authority</li>
                                <li>No application fees or discriminatory screening</li>
                                <li>Properties are pre-inspected and Section 8 ready</li>
                                <li>
                                    Our team handles all voucher coordination with your housing
                                    authority
                                </li>
                                <li>
                                    Transparent process with clear communication at every step
                                </li>
                            </ul>
                            <p>
                                If you have questions about voucher acceptance,
                                <a href='contact.html' class='gold-link'>contact us directly</a>.
                            </p>
                        </div>
                    </div>

                    <div class='accordion__item faq-item'>
                        <button class='accordion__button faq-question' type='button' aria-expanded='false'
                            aria-controls='faq-3'>
                            <span>What about HUD-VASH for veterans?</span>
                            <span class='accordion__icon' aria-hidden='true'>
                                <svg width='20' height='20' viewBox='0 0 24 24' fill='none' stroke='currentColor'
                                    stroke-width='2'>
                                    <polyline points='6 9 12 15 18 9' />
                                </svg>
                            </span>
                        </button>
                        <div class='accordion__panel faq-answer' id='faq-3'>
                            <p>
                                <strong>We are fully HUD-VASH approved</strong> and actively
                                partner with the VA to house veterans. As a veteran-owned
                                company, we understand the unique needs of our fellow service
                                members.
                            </p>
                            <p>HUD-VASH benefits include:</p>
                            <ul>
                                <li>Direct coordination with your VA case manager</li>
                                <li>Veterans receive priority consideration</li>
                                <li>Specialized veteran-friendly properties</li>
                                <li>Ongoing support during the transition to housing</li>
                                <li>Understanding of military culture and experiences</li>
                            </ul>
                            <p>
                                If you're working with the VA on housing, we can help
                                streamline the process.
                            </p>
                        </div>
                    </div>

                    <div class='accordion__item faq-item'>
                        <button class='accordion__button faq-question' type='button' aria-expanded='false'
                            aria-controls='faq-4'>
                            <span>What areas do you serve in East Texas?</span>
                            <span class='accordion__icon' aria-hidden='true'>
                                <svg width='20' height='20' viewBox='0 0 24 24' fill='none' stroke='currentColor'
                                    stroke-width='2'>
                                    <polyline points='6 9 12 15 18 9' />
                                </svg>
                            </span>
                        </button>
                        <div class='accordion__panel faq-answer' id='faq-4'>
                            <p>
                                We serve communities across East Texas, focusing on areas with
                                strong veteran populations and good access to services:
                            </p>
                            <ul>
                                <li><strong>Primary Markets:</strong> Tyler, Longview</li>
                                <li>
                                    <strong>Secondary Markets:</strong> Marshall, Jefferson,
                                    Mineola, Kemp
                                </li>
                                <li>
                                    <strong>Surrounding Areas:</strong> Nacogdoches, Palestine,
                                    Kilgore, White Oak
                                </li>
                            </ul>
                            <p>Our properties are strategically located near:</p>
                            <ul>
                                <li>VA medical centers and outpatient clinics</li>
                                <li>Public transportation routes</li>
                                <li>Employment opportunities and job training centers</li>
                                <li>Schools and community services</li>
                                <li>Grocery stores and essential services</li>
                            </ul>
                        </div>
                    </div>

                    <div class='accordion__item faq-item'>
                        <button class='accordion__button faq-question' type='button' aria-expanded='false'
                            aria-controls='faq-5'>
                            <span>What makes Properties 4 Creations different from other
                                landlords?</span>
                            <span class='accordion__icon' aria-hidden='true'>
                                <svg width='20' height='20' viewBox='00 24 24' fill='none' stroke='currentColor'
                                    stroke-width='2'>
                                    <polyline points='6 9 12 15 18 9' />
                                </svg>
                            </span>
                        </button>
                        <div class='accordion__panel faq-answer' id='faq-5'>
                            <p>
                                <strong>We're veteran-owned and operated</strong>, which means
                                we bring a unique understanding to housing for veterans and
                                families. Here's what sets us apart:
                            </p>
                            <ul>
                                <li>
                                    <strong>100% Voucher Acceptance:</strong> We welcome Section
                                    8 and HUD-VASH without discrimination
                                </li>
                                <li>
                                    <strong>Premium Renovations:</strong> Every property meets
                                    our rigorous $30,000+ renovation standards
                                </li>
                                <li>
                                    <strong>Transparency:</strong> We publish our renovation
                                    standards and cost breakdowns
                                </li>
                                <li>
                                    <strong>Quality Guarantees:</strong> Comprehensive
                                    warranties on all systems
                                </li>
                                <li>
                                    <strong>Veteran Understanding:</strong> We understand
                                    military culture and challenges
                                </li>
                                <li>
                                    <strong>Community Focus:</strong> We're invested in
                                    rebuilding East Texas communities
                                </li>
                                <li>
                                    <strong>Fair Housing Compliance:</strong> Strict adherence
                                    to all anti-discrimination laws
                                </li>
                            </ul>
                        </div>
                    </div>

                    <div class='accordion__item faq-item'>
                        <button class='accordion__button faq-question' type='button' aria-expanded='false'
                            aria-controls='faq-6'>
                            <span>Are all your properties recently renovated?</span>
                            <span class='accordion__icon' aria-hidden='true'>
                                <svg width='20' height='20' viewBox='0 0 24 24' fill='none' stroke='currentColor'
                                    stroke-width='2'>
                                    <polyline points='6 9 12 15 18 9' />
                                </svg>
                            </span>
                        </button>
                        <div class='accordion__panel faq-answer' id='faq-6'>
                            <p>
                                <strong>Yes, every property undergoes comprehensive
                                    renovation</strong>
                                before becoming available. Our renovation process includes:
                            </p>
                            <h4>Core Systems (12-month warranties)</h4>
                            <ul>
                                <li>Complete HVAC system replacement and certification</li>
                                <li>Full roof replacement with premium materials</li>
                                <li>New plumbing throughout with copper pipes</li>
                                <li>Modern electrical systems with code compliance</li>
                            </ul>
                            <h4>Interior Finishes (6-month warranties)</h4>
                            <ul>
                                <li>Professional painting throughout</li>
                                <li>New or refinished flooring</li>
                                <li>Updated kitchens with new appliances</li>
                                <li>Modern bathrooms with new fixtures</li>
                                <li>Fresh fixtures and lighting</li>
                            </ul>
                            <p>
                                See our complete
                                <a href='transparency.html' class='gold-link'>renovation standards</a>
                                for full details.
                            </p>
                        </div>
                    </div>

                    <div class='accordion__item faq-item'>
                        <button class='accordion__button faq-question' type='button' aria-expanded='false'
                            aria-controls='faq-7'>
                            <span>How long does the application process take?</span>
                            <span class='accordion__icon' aria-hidden='true'>
                                <svg width='20' height='20' viewBox='0 0 24 24' fill='none' stroke='currentColor'
                                    stroke-width='2'>
                                    <polyline points='6 9 12 15 18 9' />
                                </svg>
                            </span>
                        </button>
                        <div class='accordion__panel faq-answer' id='faq-7'>
                            <p>
                                The timeline varies based on your voucher status and property
                                availability:
                            </p>
                            <h4>For Applicants with Active Vouchers</h4>
                            <ul>
                                <li><strong>Application Review:</strong> 24-48 hours</li>
                                <li>
                                    <strong>Document Verification:</strong> 1-3 business days
                                </li>
                                <li>
                                    <strong>Property Viewing:</strong> Same week if approved
                                </li>
                                <li><strong>Lease Signing:</strong> Within 1-2 weeks</li>
                            </ul>
                            <h4>For Applicants Without Vouchers</h4>
                            <ul>
                                <li><strong>Application Review:</strong> 24-48 hours</li>
                                <li>
                                    <strong>Voucher Guidance:</strong> We'll help connect you
                                    with local housing authorities
                                </li>
                                <li>
                                    <strong>Timeline:</strong> Depends on housing authority
                                    waitlist status
                                </li>
                            </ul>
                            <p>We'll keep you informed throughout the entire process.</p>
                        </div>
                    </div>

                    <div class='accordion__item faq-item'>
                        <button class='accordion__button faq-question' type='button' aria-expanded='false'
                            aria-controls='faq-8'>
                            <span>What if I don't have a housing voucher yet?</span>
                            <span class='accordion__icon' aria-hidden='true'>
                                <svg width='20' height='20' viewBox='0 0 24 24' fill='none' stroke='currentColor'
                                    stroke-width='2'>
                                    <polyline points='6 9 12 15 18 9' />
                                </svg>
                            </span>
                        </button>
                        <div class='accordion__panel faq-answer' id='faq-8'>
                            <p>
                                <strong>We can help guide you through the voucher process.</strong>
                                Here's how we assist applicants without vouchers:
                            </p>
                            <h4>Section 8 Vouchers</h4>
                            <ul>
                                <li>Help you understand eligibility requirements</li>
                                <li>Connect you with local housing authorities</li>
                                <li>Guide you through application processes</li>
                                <li>Monitor waitlist openings</li>
                            </ul>
                            <h4>HUD-VASH for Veterans</h4>
                            <ul>
                                <li>Coordinate with your VA case manager</li>
                                <li>
                                    Provide documentation of our veteran-friendly properties
                                </li>
                                <li>Support the voucher application process</li>
                                <li>Expedite property matching once voucher is issued</li>
                            </ul>
                            <p>
                                Contact us to discuss your situation and we'll create a
                                personalized plan.
                            </p>
                        </div>
                    </div>

                    <div class='accordion__item faq-item'>
                        <button class='accordion__button faq-question' type='button' aria-expanded='false'
                            aria-controls='faq-9'>
                            <span>What are your income requirements?</span>
                            <span class='accordion__icon' aria-hidden='true'>
                                <svg width='20' height='20' viewBox='0 0 24 24' fill='none' stroke='currentColor'
                                    stroke-width='2'>
                                    <polyline points='6 9 12 15 18 9' />
                                </svg>
                            </span>
                        </button>
                        <div class='accordion__panel faq-answer' id='faq-9'>
                            <p>
                                Income requirements vary by program and are set by the housing
                                authorities, but generally:
                            </p>
                            <h4>Section 8 Housing Choice Vouchers</h4>
                            <ul>
                                <li>Typically 50% or below Area Median Income (AMI)</li>
                                <li>
                                    For East Texas (2025): Single person maximum ≈ $19,750/year
                                </li>
                                <li>Four-person household maximum ≈ $28,200/year</li>
                            </ul>
                            <h4>HUD-VASH</h4>
                            <ul>
                                <li>Usually 50% or below AMI</li>
                                <li>Special considerations for homeless veterans</li>
                                <li>Case-by-case evaluation for extreme circumstances</li>
                            </ul>
                            <p>
                                We can help you determine if you meet current income
                                requirements for your area.
                            </p>
                        </div>
                    </div>

                    <div class='accordion__item faq-item'>
                        <button class='accordion__button faq-question' type='button' aria-expanded='false'
                            aria-controls='faq-10'>
                            <span>What are your income requirements?</span>
                            <span class='accordion__icon' aria-hidden='true'>
                                <svg width='20' height='20' viewBox='0 0 24 24' fill='none' stroke='currentColor'
                                    stroke-width='2'>
                                    <polyline points='6 9 12 15 18 9' />
                                </svg>
                            </span>
                        </button>
                        <div class='accordion__panel faq-answer' id='faq-10'>
                            <p>
                                Income requirements vary by program and are set by the housing
                                authorities, but generally:
                            </p>
                            <h4>Section 8 Housing Choice Vouchers</h4>
                            <ul>
                                <li>Typically 50% or below Area Median Income (AMI)</li>
                                <li>
                                    For East Texas (2025): Single person maximum ≈ $19,750/year
                                </li>
                                <li>Four-person household maximum ≈ $28,200/year</li>
                            </ul>
                            <h4>HUD-VASH</h4>
                            <ul>
                                <li>Usually 50% or below AMI</li>
                                <li>Special considerations for homeless veterans</li>
                                <li>Case-by-case evaluation for extreme circumstances</li>
                            </ul>
                            <p>
                                We can help you determine if you meet current income
                                requirements for your area.
                            </p>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </section>
    </main>

  <header class='header-glass'><nav class='navbar' role='navigation' aria-label='Main navigation'>
  <div class='nav-container'>
    <div class='nav-brand'>
      <a href='/' class='brand-link'>

    </button>

    integrity='sha384-sha384-XcPm71GSOvViJoCA7WCb/9rSD/M3VBABxIZH30y7wbDtwRymtm2Dw2NTumuGrJqB'

  <script>
    // MAP INITIALIZATION
    if (document.getElementById('map')) {
      const script = document.createElement('script');
      script.src =
        'https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/leaflet@1.9.4/dist/leaflet.js';
      script.integrity =
        'sha256-20nQCchB9co0qIjJZRGuk2/Z9VM+kNiyxNV1lvTlZBo=';
      script.crossOrigin = 'anonymous';
      script.onload = () => {
        const map = L.map('map').setView([32.35, -95.3], 10);
        L.tileLayer('https://{s}.tile.openstreetmap.org/{z}/{x}/{y}.png', {
          attribution: '© OpenStreetMap contributors',
          maxZoom: 19,
        }).addTo(map);

        L.marker([32.351, -95.301], {
          title: 'Tyler Properties',
        })
          .addTo(map)
          .bindPopup('<b>Tyler, TX</b><br>Multiple Properties Available');

        L.marker([32.5, -94.74], {
          title: 'Longview Properties',
        })
          .addTo(map)
          .bindPopup('<b>Longview, TX</b><br>Multiple Properties Available');
      };
      document.head.appendChild(script);
    }
  </script>

FILE: docs\js\accessibility-enhanced.js
SIZE: 7596 bytes
MODIFIED: 2025-12-18 22:30:58
================================================================================
// ACCESSIBILITY ENHANCED FEATURES
// Enhanced accessibility features for Properties 4 Creations website
(function () {
  'use strict';

  // Enhanced Skip Link Management
  function initializeSkipLinks () {
    const skipLink = document.querySelector('.skip-link');
    const mainContent = document.getElementById('main');

    if (skipLink && mainContent) {
      // Ensure skip link points to correct element
      skipLink.href = '#main';

      // Enhanced focus management for skip link
      skipLink.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
        e.preventDefault();
        mainContent.focus();
        mainContent.setAttribute('tabindex', '-1');
      });
    }
  }

  // Enhanced Keyboard Navigation
  function enhanceKeyboardNavigation () {
    // Handle Enter/Space key for interactive elements
    document.addEventListener('keydown', (e) => {
      const target = e.target;

      // Handle card interactions (property cards, etc.)
      if (
        target.classList.contains('property-card') &&
        (e.key === 'Enter' || e.key === ' ')
      ) {
        e.preventDefault();
        const link = target.querySelector('a');
        if (link) {
          link.click();
        }
      }

      // Handle CTA buttons
      if (
        target.classList.contains('cta-link') &&
        (e.key === 'Enter' || e.key === ' ')
      ) {
        e.preventDefault();
        window.location.href = target.href;
      }
    });
  }

  // ARIA Live Regions for Dynamic Content
  function initializeAriaLiveRegions () {
    // Create live region for filter results
    if (!document.getElementById('filter-status')) {
      const liveRegion = document.createElement('div');
      liveRegion.id = 'filter-status';
      liveRegion.setAttribute('aria-live', 'polite');
      liveRegion.setAttribute('aria-atomic', 'true');
      liveRegion.className = 'sr-only';
      document.body.appendChild(liveRegion);
    }

    // Create live region for form submissions
    if (!document.getElementById('form-status')) {
      const formRegion = document.createElement('div');
      formRegion.id = 'form-status';
      formRegion.setAttribute('aria-live', 'assertive');
      formRegion.setAttribute('aria-atomic', 'true');
      formRegion.className = 'sr-only';
      document.body.appendChild(formRegion);
    }
  }

  // Screen Reader Only Text
  function initializeScreenReaderText () {
    // Create styles for screen reader only content
    if (!document.getElementById('sr-styles')) {
      const srStyles = document.createElement('style');
      srStyles.id = 'sr-styles';
      srStyles.textContent = `
                .sr-only {
                    position: absolute;
                    width: 1px;
                    height: 1px;
                    padding: 0;
                    margin: -1px;
                    overflow: hidden;
                    clip: rect(0, 0, 0, 0);
                    white-space: nowrap;
                    border: 0;
                }
            `;
      document.head.appendChild(srStyles);
    }
  }

  // Enhanced Focus Management
  function enhanceFocusManagement () {
    document.addEventListener('keydown', (e) => {
      // ESC key handling for overlays
      if (e.key === 'Escape') {
        const activeModal = document.querySelector('.modal.active');
        if (activeModal) {
          closeModal(activeModal);
        }
      }
    });

    function closeModal (modal) {
      modal.classList.remove('active');
      modal.setAttribute('aria-hidden', 'true');
      // Return focus to trigger element
      const trigger = document.querySelector(`[data-modal='${modal.id}']`);
      if (trigger) {
        trigger.focus();
      }
    }
  }

  // Image Alt Text Validation
  function validateAltText () {
    const images = document.querySelectorAll('img');
    let missingAltCount = 0;

    images.forEach((img) => {
      if (!img.alt || img.alt.trim() === '') {
        // Accessibility Warning: Image missing alt text
        missingAltCount++;

        // In development mode, highlight missing alt text
        if (
          window.location.hostname === 'localhost' ||
          window.location.hostname === '127.0.0.1'
        ) {
          img.style.outline = '3px solid #ff6b6b';
          img.style.outlineOffset = '2px';
        }
      }
    });

    if (missingAltCount > 0) {
      // Accessibility: Images missing alt text detected
    }
  }

  // Form Accessibility Enhancements
  function enhanceFormAccessibility () {
    const forms = document.querySelectorAll('form');

    forms.forEach((form) => {
      const inputs = form.querySelectorAll('input, select, textarea');

      inputs.forEach((input) => {
        // Ensure all inputs have proper labeling
        if (
          !input.getAttribute('aria-label') &&
          !input.getAttribute('aria-labelledby')
        ) {
          const label = form.querySelector(`label[for='${input.id}']`);
          if (!label && input.id) {
            // Form accessibility: Input may be missing label
          }
        }

        // Enhanced error messaging
        input.addEventListener('invalid', () => {
          const formGroup = input.closest('.form-group');
          if (formGroup) {
            formGroup.classList.add('error');

            // Update ARIA-describedby for screen readers
            const errorMsg = formGroup.querySelector('.error-message');
            if (errorMsg && input.id) {
              input.setAttribute(
                'aria-describedby',
                errorMsg.id || `error-${input.id}`
              );
              errorMsg.id = errorMsg.id || `error-${input.id}`;
            }
          }
        });

        // Clear errors on input
        input.addEventListener('input', () => {
          const formGroup = input.closest('.form-group');
          if (formGroup && formGroup.classList.contains('error')) {
            formGroup.classList.remove('error');
            input.removeAttribute('aria-describedby');
          }
        });
      });
    });
  }

  // Navigation Landmark Management
  function enhanceNavigationLandmarks () {
    // Ensure main navigation has proper ARIA
    const nav = document.querySelector('nav');
    if (nav && !nav.getAttribute('aria-label')) {
      nav.setAttribute('aria-label', 'Main navigation');
    }

    // Mark footer navigation
    const footerNav = document.querySelector('.footer-section ul');
    if (footerNav && !footerNav.getAttribute('aria-label')) {
      footerNav.setAttribute('aria-label', 'Footer links');
    }
  }

  // Initialize all accessibility features
  function initAccessibility () {
    initializeSkipLinks();
    enhanceKeyboardNavigation();
    initializeAriaLiveRegions();
    initializeScreenReaderText();
    enhanceFocusManagement();
    validateAltText();
    enhanceFormAccessibility();
    enhanceNavigationLandmarks();

    // Announce successful initialization for screen readers
    const statusRegion = document.getElementById('form-status');
    if (statusRegion) {
      statusRegion.textContent = 'Accessibility enhancements loaded';
      setTimeout(() => {
        statusRegion.textContent = '';
      }, 1000);
    }

    // Accessibility enhancements initialized
  }

  // Initialize on DOM ready
  if (document.readyState === 'loading') {
    document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', initAccessibility);
  } else {
    initAccessibility();
  }

  // Export for potential external use
  window.AccessibilityEnhancer = {
    validateAltText: validateAltText,
    enhanceFormAccessibility: enhanceFormAccessibility
  };
})();


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
FILE: docs\js\button-utilities.js
SIZE: 5679 bytes
MODIFIED: 2025-12-18 22:23:16
================================================================================
/**
 * Enhanced Button Utilities for Properties 4 Creations
 * Provides loading states, ripple effects, and interactive features
 */

class ButtonUtils {
  constructor () {
    this.init();
  }

  init () {
    this.setupRippleEffects();
    this.setupLoadingStates();
    this.setupConfirmationDialogs();
    this.setupCopyToClipboard();
  }

  /**
   * Setup ripple effects for buttons
   */
  setupRippleEffects () {
    document.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
      const button = e.target.closest('.btn');
      if (!button || button.classList.contains('btn-ripple-disabled')) return;

      // Skip if button is disabled or loading
      if (button.disabled || button.classList.contains('loading')) return;

      this.createRipple(button, e);
    });
  }

  /**
   * Create ripple effect
   */
  createRipple (button, event) {
    const ripple = document.createElement('span');
    ripple.className = 'btn-ripple';

    const rect = button.getBoundingClientRect();
    const size = Math.max(rect.width, rect.height);
    const x = event.clientX - rect.left - size / 2;
    const y = event.clientY - rect.top - size / 2;

    ripple.style.width = ripple.style.height = size + 'px';
    ripple.style.left = x + 'px';
    ripple.style.top = y + 'px';

    button.appendChild(ripple);

    setTimeout(() => {
      ripple.remove();
    }, 600);
  }

  /**
   * Set loading state on button
   */
  static setLoading (selector, loadingText = 'Loading...') {
    const button =
      typeof selector === 'string'
        ? document.querySelector(selector)
        : selector;
    if (!button) return;

    button.classList.add('loading');
    button.disabled = true;

    // Store original text
    if (!button.dataset.originalText) {
      button.dataset.originalText = button.innerHTML;
    }

    button.innerHTML = loadingText;
  }

  /**
   * Remove loading state from button
   */
  static removeLoading (selector, newText = null) {
    const button =
      typeof selector === 'string'
        ? document.querySelector(selector)
        : selector;
    if (!button) return;

    button.classList.remove('loading');
    button.disabled = false;

    // Restore original text or set new text
    if (newText) {
      button.innerHTML = newText;
    } else if (button.dataset.originalText) {
      button.innerHTML = button.dataset.originalText;
      delete button.dataset.originalText;
    }
  }

  /**
   * Setup loading states for forms
   */
  setupLoadingStates () {
    document.addEventListener('submit', (e) => {
      const form = e.target;
      const submitBtn = form.querySelector('button[type="submit"]');

      if (submitBtn && !submitBtn.classList.contains('no-loading')) {
        ButtonUtils.setLoading(submitBtn, 'Submitting...');
      }
    });
  }

  /**
   * Add confirmation dialog to button
   */
  static addConfirmation (selector, message, callback) {
    const button =
      typeof selector === 'string'
        ? document.querySelector(selector)
        : selector;
    if (!button) return;

    button.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
      if (!confirm(message)) {
        e.preventDefault();
        return false;
      }

      if (callback) {
        callback(e);
      }
    });
  }

  /**
   * Setup confirmation dialogs
   */
  setupConfirmationDialogs () {
    // Auto-setup for buttons with data-confirm attribute
    document.querySelectorAll('[data-confirm]').forEach((button) => {
      const message = button.dataset.confirm;
      ButtonUtils.addConfirmation(button, message);
    });
  }

  /**
   * Copy text to clipboard
   */
  static copyToClipboard (text, button = null) {
    navigator.clipboard
      .writeText(text)
      .then(() => {
        if (button) {
          const originalText = button.innerHTML;
          button.innerHTML = '<i data-lucide="check" class="icon"></i> Copied!';
          button.classList.add('btn-success');

          setTimeout(() => {
            button.innerHTML = originalText;
            button.classList.remove('btn-success');
          }, 2000);
        }
      })
      .catch((err) => {
        // Failed to copy text - silently handle error
      });
  }

  /**
   * Setup copy to clipboard functionality
   */
  setupCopyToClipboard () {
    document.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
      const button = e.target.closest('[data-copy]');
      if (!button) return;

      const text = button.dataset.copy;
      ButtonUtils.copyToClipboard(text, button);
    });
  }

  /**
   * Toggle button group active state
   */
  static toggleButtonGroup (button) {
    const group = button.closest('.btn-group');
    if (!group) return;

    // Remove active state from all buttons in group
    group.querySelectorAll('.btn').forEach((btn) => {
      btn.classList.remove('active');
      btn.setAttribute('aria-pressed', 'false');
    });

    // Add active state to clicked button
    button.classList.add('active');
    button.setAttribute('aria-pressed', 'true');
  }

  /**
   * Setup button groups
   */
  setupButtonGroups () {
    document.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
      const button = e.target.closest('.btn-group .btn');
      if (!button) return;

      ButtonUtils.toggleButtonGroup(button);
    });
  }

  /**
   * Initialize button groups on page load
   */
  initializeButtonGroups () {
    document.querySelectorAll('.btn-group .active').forEach((button) => {
      button.setAttribute('aria-pressed', 'true');
    });
  }
}

// Initialize when DOM is ready
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
  new ButtonUtils();
});

// Export for module usage
if (typeof module !== 'undefined' && module.exports) {
  module.exports = ButtonUtils;
}
